[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTgyMTE3LzY0Mzc5OTEucG5n/original/VJLLrB.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTgyMTE3LzY0Mzc5NzEucG5n/original/foV4WZ.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTgyMTE3LzY0Mzc5NzIucG5n/original/C0t3L%2F.png]]






<<list-links "[tag[Android]sort[title]]">>







<h1>Claim a Better Future!</h1>
<p>In a ruined and terraformed world where most of humanity is under the yoke of a brutal regime, the former workers of a once-remote factory - now known as The Collective - have risen up to create a future of freedom from oppression. You are an Ace - a highly skilled pilot referred from a Division in The Collective and assigned a humanoid combat vehicle known as a Frame. You and your Strike Team of fellow Aces must take on The Collective‚Äôs greatest threats, ensure its survival, and carve a path for its continued success.
</p>
<h1>Rules-Light Tactics</h1>
<p>APOCALYPSE FRAME is designed to be very fast to pick up and play, and it's suitable for both one-shots and extended campaigns. Combat is quick, punchy, and deadly for Aces' enemies. This game includes:
</p>
<ul><li>A very simple three-attribute resolution system that only needs d6's.
</li><li>Nine Frames with unique traits and abilities.
</li><li>Tactical rules simple enough to use  without a grid (though a hex grid is recommended) but deep enough to  maintain interest over time.
</li><li>A modular loadout system that provides great flexibility for your Frame with low bookkeeping.</li><li>A host of threats for your Aces to defeat:
<ul><li>21 standard enemies.
</li><li>4 Prime enemies - deadly threats who can be used as bosses and prominent antagonists.
</li><li>2 Colossus enemies - enormous threats who can be the centerpiece of a battle.</li></ul></li><li>Advice on running the game and customizing the setting to fit your preferences.</li><li>A campaign system with varied kinds of missions and rewards that provides texture and structure to longer-running games.</li></ul>
<h1>ACES HIGH is out!</h1>
<p>ACES HIGH, the expansion/companion to APOCALYPSE FRAME, is now included for everyone who has APOCALYPSE FRAME! This includes:</p>
<ul><li>6 Experimental Armaments, 6 Experimental Modular Systems, and 3 Experimental Frames (which include new Integral Systems, Integral Traits, and Build Traits), in addition to many Superior Tags and Drawback Tags.<br>
</li><li>Some notes on running APOCALYPSE FRAME as a campaign, including  Crisis Advances (making your enemies stronger over time, including 3  new standard enemies) and Ace Advances (new benefits and functionality  to improve your Aces over time).
</li><li><strong>Tyrants!</strong> These are dangerous prey for a Strike Team  - they‚Äôre nasty boss enemies you can use for special occasions that are  meant to be treated as equals. 10 Tyrants are included, as well as  advice on making your own</li></ul>
<h1>Ballad of Industrial Gods is out!</h1>
<p>Ballad of Industrial Gods, an expansive mission, is out now! You can check that out <a href="https://binary-star-games.itch.io/ballad-of-industrial-gods" target="_blank">here</a>!<br></p>
<h1>An Illuminated Mecha RPG</h1>
<p>This game is Illuminated by LUMEN, based on the LUMEN RPG system designed by Spencer Campbell, Gila RPGs. This game is in no way affiliated with Spencer Campbell or Gila RPGs. <img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzY2OTIzMzcucG5n/original/OSzvfj.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<h1>Influences</h1>
<p>I was most influenced by: 
      </p>
<ul><li>LUMEN/LIGHT, clearly!</li><li>Xenoblade Chronicles X (parts of it, anyhow) had a ton of influence on the concept and prospective missions and enemies. 
</li><li>Armored Core was an inspiration for the speed of play and modularity of Frames, as well as the moment-to-moment feel in general.</li><li>Battletech gave me the idea of using hexes and lent some inspiration for how initial/canonical Frame loadouts are laid out.</li><li>XCOM was an unexpected and unintentional (but ultimately welcome) influence for campaign flow.</li></ul>
<h1>Stay Tuned!</h1>
<p>    I have been following this with content modules,  including things like pre-written missions, campaign planning ideas,  and new Armaments, Systems, and Frames. More to come as well!<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1MjE0Ny83NDIxOTIwLnBuZw==/original/Vq2Hrq.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1MjE0Ny83NjM4NDQ0LnBuZw==/original/%2FQhb7i.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1MjE0Ny83NjM4NDk2LnBuZw==/original/EwWi2u.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1MjE0Ny83NjM4NDU1LnBuZw==/original/3nVJko.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1MjE0Ny83NjY4ODA5LnBuZw==/original/Mv1G1V.png]]






<p>Welcome to Apple Sauce Apartments, a spacious low cost living complex situated in the most desirable of rural locations!<br></p>
<p>Become part of the lively community, bask in the joys of a truly unique shared accommodation.</p>
<p>Experience true convenience, a space to unwind your body and mind.</p>
<p>Place your faith us and&nbsp;ponder your humanity through our fantastic offers.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Perks of this property:</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Daily portions of fruit provided onsite.</p>
<p>Single glazing walls.</p>
<p>Shared toilet facilities.</p>
<p>Bills not included.</p>
<p>Complimentary 2% saving coupons for offsite laundry facilities.</p>
<p>Two year council tax backlog.<br></p>
<p>Random weekly inspections.</p>
<p>Microwave with two settings.</p>
<p>Self proclaimed 'friendly' landlord.</p>
<p>Lamp provided.</p>
<p>No driveway, walking encouraged.</p>
<p>Three months upfront deposit.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Apple Sauce Apartments, your new forever home!</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Credits:</p>
<p><a href="https://shallow-lagoon.itch.io/" target="_blank">ShallowLagoon</a> - Artwork, Story and Development</p>
<p>Special thanks to&nbsp;<a href="https://slitherpunk.itch.io/" target="_blank">Autumn Rain</a> for creating the&nbsp;game's font&nbsp;<a href="https://slitherpunk.itch.io/autumn-rain-font-one" target="_blank">Autumn Rain Font One</a>.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Warning, contains flashing imagery!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA2MTYwMC82MDc3Njc2LmdpZg==/original/T0vosw.gif]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA2MTYwMC82MDc3Njc1LmdpZg==/original/WQZiq4.gif]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA2MTYwMC82MDc3NjY1LmdpZg==/original/J%2BhSuy.gif]]






<h3></h3>
<h3></h3>
<h3>The extreme sports space opera you never knew you needed is finally here.</h3>
<p><em>The roar of the holocrowd is overpowering. The weight of the ball in your hands isn‚Äôt nearly as heavy as the fate of your Colony on your shoulders. The smell of burnt duracrete fills the recycled air as your gravskates crackle to life.&nbsp;</em></p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Aboard the sacred arenaship <em>Ersatz</em>, the ceaseless conflicts of the six colony starships of the Ark fleet are tried and mediated by their anointed athletes in an ancient sport of champions: Arkball.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<p class="text-center">‚óâ&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;‚óâ&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;‚óâ<br></p>
<p><br></p>
<p>In this complete Powered by the Apocalypse tabletop roleplaying system, you and your friends take the roles of the players of one of the six venerated arkball teams. With the help of a GM you‚Äôll tell the tragic, world-shaping stories of these pinnacle athletes.</p>
<p>Inside the fully-illustrated zine, you‚Äôll find everything you need to:&nbsp;</p>
<p>‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ñ∂ Immerse in the world of the Ark fleet.</p>
<p>‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ñ∂ Develop interesting and influential characters.</p>
<p>‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ñ∂ Generate the stakes on which arkball matches are played.</p>
<p>‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ñ∂ 24 pages, full color covers, B&amp;W interior.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p class="text-center">‚óâ&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;‚óâ&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;‚óâ</p>
<p class="text-center"><strong><br></strong></p>
<p class="text-center"><strong>Arkball is currently available for purchase as a physical and digital combo&nbsp;on <a href="https://www.exaltedfuneral.com/products/arkball-pdf" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Exalted Funeral</a>. For physical editions, please head over there!</strong><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3MTk3MS83NTA0MDE1LnBuZw==/original/G6LnIl.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3MTk3MS83NTA0MDE2LnBuZw==/original/OJ2Po7.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3MTk3MS83NDA2ODkwLnBuZw==/original/PvGoTI.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3MTk3MS83NDA2ODkxLnBuZw==/original/b4ug0V.png]]






<p>'Around the Couch' is a '<a href="https://forthequeengame.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Descended from the Queen</a>' hack created for the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/couch-dungeon-jam">Couch Dungeon Game Jam</a>. It was inspired by the idea that a couch could be a metaphysical dungeon where one becomes trapped in their own thoughts. In this case, those trapping thoughts are the memories formed either while sitting on a couch, or being close to it.</p>
<p>In 'Around the Couch', the players are housemates gathering to decide the fate of their oft-used couch. Does it possess enough sentimental value that they decide to keep it, or has the time come for a new couch? The only way to know for sure is to come together and share some memories... Around the Couch.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>NOTE: This initial release includes a printer friendly cut and paste/tape version with no artwork as well as a file of assets for use with a VTT application or site.&nbsp;I am working on an update that will have&nbsp; some 'Couch' cards to provide a bit of inspiration.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNDUxNjE4LzIyOTkyNDIuanBn/original/xIa2Xg.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNDUxNjE4LzIyOTkyMzMuanBn/original/smj%2Fu8.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNDUxNjE4LzIyOTkyMzUuanBn/original/gZdtc%2F.jpg]]






<p><em>You were made to be unmade, given purposefully shortened life by a Creator who has abandoned you, leaving you with nothing but questions.&nbsp;</em></p>
<p><em>Now you follow the trail of what your Creator left behind, trying to find answers as you feel your body crumble with every passing moment. You do not know how much longer you have to live, but what will you discover before you die?</em></p>
<p class="text-center">-------</p>
<p>As My Body Crumbles is a solo journaling TTRPG of discovery and death designed by Kienna Shaw (<a href="http://twitter.com/KiennaS" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">@KiennaS</a>) and Jason Cutrone (<a href="http://twitter.com/JustJasonPls" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">@JustJasonPls</a>).&nbsp;&nbsp;Inspired by stories like Blade Runner and Frankenstein and using the framework of <a href="https://kiennas.itch.io/before-the-tower-falls">Before the Tower Falls</a>, As My Body Crumbles lets you&nbsp;take on the role of an artificially created being in the last moments of their life. Setting and genre agnostic, you can play everything from a robot to a raised undead as you uncover objects and try to piece together answers about your existence, the past, and your Creator.</p>
<p>All you need to play is the rules, a standard deck of cards, and a pen/marker and paper.</p>
<p>CW:&nbsp;As My Body Crumbles explores themes of impending death that may parallel experiences of terminal or chronic illness, with player character death acting as an integral (and inevitable) part of the game</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODAzMzUzLzQ0OTk4MjQuanBn/original/neeH8g.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODAzMzUzLzQ0OTk4MjYuanBn/original/9dy%2BPp.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODAzMzUzLzQ0OTk4MjcuanBn/original/5f7qWe.jpg]]






<p class="text-center"><em>As the Sun Forever Sets</em> is a TTRPG Hexcrawl ‚Äì&nbsp;powered by the <em>Forged in the Dark</em> system ‚Äì about interpersonal conflict &amp; survival with themes of Horror &amp; Dread, inspired by The War of the Worlds by HG Wells.</p>
<p class="text-center">You play a&nbsp;group of ordinary Victorian people trying to survive the chaos of the British Empire, as it collapses under the overwhelming weight of an invasion from Mars. The Martians are advanced, eldritch and terrifying. They will win this. The end is all but certain and the day cannot be saved. You‚Äôll live your everyday life until everything falls apart, then struggle to survive the unfolding war until you escape, die, or it all ends, leaving nothing behind.
</p>
<p class="text-center"><em>Search for supplies, or a boat out of Britain? Do you trek across the country to rescue a loved one, or build and furnish a makeshift shelter to keep you safe? Do you sacrifice your energy for your group, or is self preservation all that matters?</em>
</p>
<p class="text-center">We play to find out if the group can work together to survive the conflict, save what‚Äôs dear to them, and stay true to themselves.</p>
<figure><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzczMDc3NjEucG5n/original/notFx3.png" loading="lazy"></figure>
<blockquote class="text-center">‚ÄúHow incredible that it is the beginning of the new century! Scarcely one year ago I, like many of you, was a citizen of the largest Empire humanity has ever built; a fact that prior to the events of that darkly metamorphic June, had flitted in and out of my mind as thoughtlessly as the state of the weather.
Like you, I now stand in the ruin of that collapsed Empire, remembering the days during which I lived in flight and terror; remembering what it was to count life by the second. For all the unspeakable death and horror the Martians wrought in those 20 short days, perhaps we should be grateful for the harsh lesson in humanity; the seemingly miraculous chance to see the cruel nature of our ways, and the opportunity to mend them.
Once those dread invaders fell, it is inconceivable that one could look upon a crowd and not feel gratitude for each individual person in it; to not think ‚ÄòHow wonderful it is, the breadth of experience in human life!‚Äô Where once we may have looked for weakness and profit, we must now see the inherent value of life itself, in all its forms; we must uplift and protect one another. And in doing so, we shall better the whole of humankind."</blockquote>
<p class="text-center"><em>A selection from a pamphlet published July 1900, entitled&nbsp;<strong>‚ÄúThe New Century - A Year of Relief from Martian Terror.‚Äù</strong>&nbsp;- Author Unknown</em>
</p>
<p class="text-center"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2OTUwMDAucG5n/original/TFfEeb.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<figure><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzczMDc3NjEucG5n/original/notFx3.png" loading="lazy"></figure>
<iframe src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/playlist/4V66tC5kVTbEmJil3GLS2D?utm_source=generator&amp;theme=0" width="100%" height="380" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
<p class="text-center"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzczMDc3NjEucG5n/original/notFx3.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 class="text-center"><strong>This game is in&nbsp;Early Access</strong></h3>
<p class="text-center"><em>As the Sun Forever Sets</em> is currently in development, and aspects of it are subject to change based on playtesting, and feedback from people who purchase it.</p>
<p class="text-center">The game will be <strong>50% off</strong> until the full release.</p>
<p class="text-center">There is no set release date for <em>As the Sun Forever Sets</em>.&nbsp;However, the game is fully playable, largely feature-complete, and everything you need to play is included.&nbsp;</p>
<p class="text-center">Your purchase entitles you to all future digital versions of the game.<span></span></p>
<figure><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzczMDc3NjEucG5n/original/notFx3.png" loading="lazy"></figure>
<h3 class="text-center"><strong>Information</strong></h3>
<p class="text-center">As the game is in Early Access, these are subject to change based on playtesting and feedback.
</p>
<ul class="text-center"><li class="text-justify"><strong>Recommended Players</strong>: 3-5
</li><li class="text-justify"><strong>Recommended Age</strong>: 15+
</li><li class="text-justify"><strong>Current Length:</strong> 168 pages</li><li class="text-justify"><strong>Playtime</strong>: 1-6 hours per session
</li><li class="text-justify"><strong>Campaign Length</strong>: 6-10 sessions</li></ul>
<p class="text-center"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzczMDc3NjEucG5n/original/notFx3.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<h3 class="text-center"><strong>What am I currently working on?</strong></h3>
<p class="text-center"><strong>Alpha 2.2</strong></p>
<ul class="text-justify"><li>Playtesting and rule revisions.</li><li>Expanding the Setting.</li><li>Refining the Map.</li><li>Expanding the How to Play section.</li><li>Simplifying the Companions system.</li><li>A Miro board for playing over Discord.</li><li>GM Reference Sheets</li><li>Random Roll Tables for reference.</li></ul>
<h3 class="text-center"><strong>What's next?</strong></h3>
<p class="text-center">Here's a few of the bigger things I'll be doing in future versions.</p>
<ul class=""><li>Continued rules revisions based on feedback.</li><li>A free&nbsp;quickstart, with an example&nbsp;adventure and prebuilt characters.</li>
<li>A "Changing the Game" section.</li>
<li>Original cover artwork.</li>
<li>Low ink sheets.</li></ul>
<h3 class="text-center"><strong>What would I like to do?</strong></h3>
<p class="text-center">If this project is popular enough, here's a few places I'd like to go with it. It's a <strong>wish list</strong>, not things that'll definitely happen.</p>
<ul class="text-justify"><li>A supplement enabling extended play, faction conflict, west-marches style campaigns &amp; expanded shelters.</li><li>A far-future setting supplement, including original artwork, a new map and play sheets.</li><li>A physical copy, with fully original artwork.</li></ul>
<p class="text-justify"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzczMDc3NjEucG5n/original/notFx3.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 class="text-center"><strong>Credits</strong></h3>
