[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MTkzLnBuZw==/original/mv7Jgr.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MTk0LnBuZw==/original/aFneb%2B.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MTk1LnBuZw==/original/mYwEXn.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MTk2LnBuZw==/original/7HQk%2FX.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MTk3LnBuZw==/original/RSceEn.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MjAzLnBuZw==/original/KbP2Mn.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS84MDAwMzE3LnBuZw==/original/Jz22C4.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1MzQ5OS83ODg2MjAyLnBuZw==/original/k7bnIa.png]]






<p></p>
<h2 class="text-center">It's your turn to the be the hero!</h2>
<p><em>Astonishing Super Heroes</em>&nbsp;is a roleplaying game of superpowered action and drama. Streamlining the classic FASERIP system from the ground up via the OGL,&nbsp;<em>Astonishing Super Heroes</em>&nbsp;plays faster and adds dramatic roleplay mechanics to better represent the variety of challenges superheroes face in the comics, shows, and movies we love so much.
</p>
<h3><strong>The&nbsp;<em>Basic Rulebook</em>&nbsp;includes:</strong></h3>
<ul><li>Everything you need to emulate superpowered characters from any comic, TV show, or movie universe you're already familiar with.
</li><li>A revamped Karma system inspired by modern narrative RPGs and customized to your superhero's identity: play an inspiring moral paragon, a clever mystic willing to deal with dark powers, a violent antihero, or a reformed villain.
</li><li>Rules that promote teamwork and that can be as tactical or freeform as you want.
</li><li>New rules for challenging social interactions using a stress and resolve mechanic, as well as leveraging money and resources against your foes.
</li><li>30 pages devoted to building custom super powers and gear, with over 100 fully-built powers as examples.
</li></ul>
<p>The <em>Basic Rulebook</em> also features great character sheets and comprehensive reference sheets, making it a breeze to run! Plus, it's fully compatible with other FASERIP games, and broadly compatible with most four color supers games.
</p>
<p>The&nbsp;<em>Basic Rulebook</em>&nbsp;is Book 1 of 2 for the&nbsp;<em>Astonishing Super Heroes</em>&nbsp;RPG. Look for Book 2:&nbsp;<em>Spectacular Origins</em>, coming soon!
</p>
<h2>Spectacular Origins BETA&nbsp;PDF Included</h2>
<p>We've included the BETA PDF of our second release,&nbsp;<em>Spectacular Origins</em>. This gives you multiple character creation methods, loads of advice and inspiration on building thrilling scenarios and customized profiles, and optional rules for simplifying NPCs and Powers. Plus, you'll have a chance to provide feedback on even more systems and rules ahead of its release!
</p>
<p>We'll be periodically updating this PDF so new systems and tools can be tested ahead of the release of Spectacular Origins.
</p>
<h2>Powering the LSOSW Podcast</h2>
<p><em>Astonishing Super Heroes</em>&nbsp;is the fully realized, fully customized FASERIP-inspired system powering the <a href="https://anchor.fm/LSOSW" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">actual play podcast LSOSW</a>! Check us out on all your favorite podcast services and social media as LSOSWpodcast, and with this RPG, build your own custom heroes and epic storylines!
</p>
<p><strong>Get free downloads, updates, alerts, and provide feedback in the comments here on itch or&nbsp;at <a href="https://astonishingsuperheroes.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">AstonishingSuperHeroes.com</a></strong>
</p>
<h2>Print Copies!</h2>
<p>Looking for print copies?</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/379178/Astonishing-Super-Heroes-Book-1-Basic-Rulebook?affiliate_id=307574" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">DriveThruRPG</a></li><li><a href="https://www.thirdkingdomgames.com/product-page/astonishing-super-heroes-basic-rulebook" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Third Kingdom Games</a></li></ul>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0ODgyLnBuZw==/original/%2FANaU3.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0ODk1LnBuZw==/original/2so2vB.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0ODk2LnBuZw==/original/du0sPk.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0OTAwLnBuZw==/original/Wfk6%2B2.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0ODk5LnBuZw==/original/GQr5Rq.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0OTAxLnBuZw==/original/xc2MJJ.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0OTAzLnBuZw==/original/Wt0X2S.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0OTA1LnBuZw==/original/BLduod.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0OTAyLnBuZw==/original/kuv0lP.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0ODk3LnBuZw==/original/jZTG9I.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MTE2NC84MDQ0OTA0LnBuZw==/original/PcWb28.png]]






<p><em>Athanor</em> is a solo journalling game about setting sail on a great voyage and leaving your old life behind.&nbsp;Over the course of one year, you will face five trials, and overcome each of them as you change and grow.</p>
<p>The game features:</p>
<ul><li>Flame-based gameplay</li><li>Death-defying coin flips</li><li>Reflective journaling</li><li>11 pages of nautical prose</li><li>No, really, you have to use fire to play, that wasn't a joke</li></ul>
<p>The game can be played in the span of two hours, or even less time, depending on how you decide to work through the prompts.</p>
<p><em>Athanor&nbsp;</em>was originally written by Sylvan Lawrence for the 24-hour "Metamorphosis" game jam on the Clawhammer Games community Discord server (which you can join <a href="https://discord.gg/tYy5hqWgfU" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>).</p>
<p>Special thanks to&nbsp;Michael&nbsp;Bacon, 90south, and Thomas Grindle!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1NTM1MS83MzE4MDU3LnBuZw==/original/g6N3%2BJ.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1NTM1MS83MzE4MDYzLnBuZw==/original/0hbxM2.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1NTM1MS83MzE4NDEwLmpwZw==/original/NmHHZV.jpg]]






<p><strong>Autophagia</strong>&nbsp;is a one-night scenario for the&nbsp;<em>Call of Cthulhu</em>&nbsp;roleplaying game.<br></p>
<p>Taking its inspirational cues from&nbsp;<em>The Poseidon Adventure</em>,&nbsp;<em>Contagion</em>,&nbsp;<em>Who Goes There?</em>/<em>The Thing</em>, and&nbsp;<em>Sandy Petersen's The Derelict</em>, the book takes a mature look at the horror of human nature and its ability to shirk from disease, the afflicted, and the causes thereof.
</p>
<p>The scenarios deal with unavoidable fates, dark secrets, and seriously bad choices made by the antagonists. As so often is the case, there are no winners when fate has trapped you in a dice game for doom or destiny. As such, please be aware that some of the themes are quite mature and are suitable for<strong>&nbsp;Gamers who are at least of young adult age and maturity.</strong></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgyOTc5OTIucG5n/original/BPQnrw.png]]






<$list filter="[is[current]has:field[average_session]]">
''Average Session'': {{!!average_session}}&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</$list>






<p>Have you ever wanted to have unique magic weapons that scale with your character? Do you think that magic items should affect the story? With Awakened Weapons you get access to a mechanic that helps you develop uniquely powerful magic items that scale with your characters as well as ten premade weapons, each with its own powers and personality.</p>
<p>This is supplementary content for the fifth edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game, ready to be added to your campaigns.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Supplements produced by Monarch Arts range from classes, monsters, items, mechanics and everything in-between. Each supplement is individually priced so you can hand pick the content that suits your game and setting.</p>
<p>You can also check out the Monarch Arts Discord <a href="https://discord.gg/X44KGNY" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgzODc2ODgucG5n/original/gvKpCE.png]]






<p>This is supplementary content for the fifth edition of the&nbsp;world's most popular roleplaying game, ready to be added to your campaigns.&nbsp;<br></p>
<p>A new origin (race) of plant-based humanoids, the Azoulas travel the forests of the world and protect them from harm with their Fey abilities and natural toxins.</p>
<p>Supplements produced by Monarch Arts range from classes,&nbsp;monsters, items, mechanics&nbsp;and everything in-between. Each supplement is individually priced so you can hand pick the content that suits your game and setting.</p>
<p>You can also check out the Monarch Arts Discord&nbsp;<a href="https://discord.gg/X44KGNY" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgzODU5ODQucG5n/original/%2Bgt%2BG0.png]]






<p>When you were young, you thought the great walls of Barrow Keep would keep you safe. But now you're coming of age, and you realize how many troubles have been inside these walls all along: duplicitous courtiers, treacherous kin, and puritanical heresy-hunters. How will you protect yourself and your friends?</p>
<p><em>Barrow Keep</em>&nbsp;is a low-prep, old-school setting driven by playbooks and adaptable, easy-to-run scenarios. You play the young residents of the Keep, coming of age while dealing with mysteries, treacheries, and intrigues.</p>
<p><em></em><strong><em>Want a print copy? You can buy them from&nbsp;<a href="https://spearwitch.com/collections/new-arrivals/products/barrow-keep-den-of-spies" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Spear Witch</a>,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.exaltedfuneral.com/products/barrow-keep-pdf" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Exalted Funeral</a>, or&nbsp;<a href="https://twentysidedstore.com/products/barrow-keep-den-of-spies?_pos=1&amp;_sid=999c4df8f&amp;_ss=r" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">The Twenty Sided Store</a>&nbsp;in the US.</em></strong></p>
<h2>System Neutral with Playkit Support</h2>
<p>Play&nbsp;<em>Barrow Keep</em> with your favorite fantasy system. The zine includes playkits, each with two adventure scenarios and several character playbooks compatible with the following game systems:</p>
<ul><li>The&nbsp;<em>5e Fantasy&nbsp;Playkit</em>&nbsp;(beta version) with seven playbook backgrounds for use with D&amp;D 5e. You'll need the 5e rules to play (compatible with the <a href="https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/5e_SRD:System_Reference_Document" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Basic/SRD</a> rules).<u><br>
</u></li><li><a href="https://necroticgnome.com/collections/old-school-essentials" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Old School Essentials</a><em>&nbsp;</em>with everything you need to run your first Barrow Keep game with OSE: 10 PC Playbooks, including seven new OSE/BX character classes,&nbsp;and 2 Scenario Packs. &nbsp;You'll need the rules<em></em>&nbsp;from Necrotic Gnome (or check out the <a href="https://oldschoolessentials.necroticgnome.com/srd/index.php/Main_Page" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">SRD</a><span></span><span></span>), or a compatible game in the D&amp;D BX style.</li><li>The&nbsp;<a href="https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/198163/Sharp-Swords--Sinister-Spells" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Sharp Swords &amp; Sinister Spells</a>&nbsp;playkit includes 10 playbooks and 2 scenarios, with some new archetypes for any&nbsp;Sharp Swords game.</li><li><a href="https://melsonian-arts-council.itch.io/troika-numinous-edition" target="_blank" style="font-size: inherit">Troika! Numinous Edition</a>&nbsp;from Melsonia Arts Council, with both adventure scenarios and 8 playbook backgrounds for Troika!</li></ul>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzMwNjMxNDUuanBn/original/RN7i1n.jpg]]






<p>A short booklet containing the kinds of rules I like to run dragon-style games with. Higher health than most retroclones, depleting Luck, simple monsters, and an intuitive AC system. Also features a simple referee section detailing how to run the game.</p>
<p>36 pages, A6 sized.</p>
<p><strong>When this reaches $1000 I will publish a print run.</strong><br></p>
<p><strong>At $1500 I will hire an artist to do actual art for it.</strong></p>
<p><strong>Every $20 spent on it will be another 10 community copies added into the pool.</strong></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzU0NTU2MTUucG5n/original/FcsZya.png]]






<p><em>You all live in the same neighborhood. Over the years, you've formed relationships and created memories. Sometimes, there are conflicts. But no matter what, you're a community. You may even consider yourselves a family.&nbsp;</em></p>
<p><strong>Be My Neighbor</strong>&nbsp;is a game based on&nbsp;<em><a href="http://www.forthequeengame.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">For the Queen</a></em>, product of Alex Roberts and Evil Hat Productions, and licensed for our use under the <a href="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license</a>.</p>
<p>This game is designed to help brainstorm intervention strategies that do not involve police interference. Players live in the same neighborhood, which you will build and explore together by responding to the prompts provided on the cards. As the world develops, you also engage with one another as well as with a non-playable neighbor named Sam, who often needs your help. <em>For My Neighbor</em> allows players to explore nice and not-so-nice&nbsp;neighborly interactions and&nbsp;discuss strategies for responding to non-emergency disturbances by using roleplaying as a gateway to a conversation we often don't have with our neighbors.</p>
<p>The digital deck includes:</p>
<ul><li>Clear instructions built right in</li><li>## prompt cards exploring characters' lives, relationships, and beliefs</li><li>An X card to remove content you don't want to include&nbsp;in the game</li></ul>
<p>---<span></span></p>
<p><strong>For My Neighbor</strong>&nbsp;is licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license: <a href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/</a></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgyNDk3MjMuanBn/original/jqF9cl.jpg]]






<p><em>BEACH EPISODE: No Loves Lost in Halcyon Sands</em> is a PbtA-like 1-page TTRPG about rest.&nbsp;Your goal in BEACH EPISODE is to just&nbsp;<em>be</em> and perhaps to look back on the days you spent in this game and say, ‚ÄúThat was time well-spent.‚Äù&nbsp;</p>
<p>BEACH EPISODE plays well as a downtime game for other RPG systems. Missing a player for your D&amp;D session? Need a lighter tone for one night? BEACH EPISODE has mechanics for relaxing and spending meaningful time with your party. It allows you to experience downtime narratively, rather than a task-based abstraction of time between adventures.</p>
<p>So breathe. Jump into the ocean. Take your time.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzY3NTgzNDAucG5n/original/cZhRnW.png]]






<p>Bee-on Genesis is my first TTRPG! It's a one-page RPG I wrote last fall, that doesn't take itself too seriously.&nbsp;</p><p>It's basically what the title describes. You play an insect (or other arthropod) piloting the discarded exoskeleton of a much larger arthropod around, like a giant robot mech. All you need is a few d6s, a DM, and a bit of creativity and you've got all it takes to play Bee-on Genesis: An Insect Mech TTRPG!</p><p>Credit to Grant Howitt for making so many awesome TTRPGs that had heavy influence on this game!&nbsp;</p><p>NOTE: The game is at a really rough draft stage right now! I'm working on making on a much cleaner version that has a screen-reader accessible/plaintext copy as well. I'm hoping to have that version up by mid-March!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgyODcxNzIucG5n/original/87QZGD.png]]






<p><strong></strong><strong>Now includes versions for regular 5e as well as O5R games such as Five Torches Deep!</strong> The regular version only requires the free Basic Rules to play.</p>
<p>The Festival of Lights is three days away, but the halflings of Hilltop Grove have a serious problem. The Fairy Tree and their beloved dryad have fallen ill. Without them, the festival is in jeopardy.</p>
<p>This 5e adventure is designed to be played by level 1 characters in about 3 hours depending on the size and experience of your group and how engaged they get with the social parts. There is a minimal amount of combat and an effort has been made to give options to avoid some of the combat while still giving them an opportunity to sling some dice and use their character abilities. If you need inspiration for the intended themes, look to Netflix's&nbsp;<em>The Dragon Prince</em>&nbsp;or Studio Ghibli movies like&nbsp;<em>Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind</em>.</p>
<p>2 VTT ready battle maps are included. The dimensions are in the PDF.</p>
<p>Interior art by Hodag Rpg</p>
<p>Cover art by William Harth</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQ3MTE4NDQucG5n/original/FGdXA%2B.png]]






<p>It‚Äôs the new moon, and a unicorn is missing from Brenda Howard Grove. You and the other bi+ witches of your coven must find and rescue this beloved member of your found family.</p>
<p>Let your bi flag fly in this analog micro RPG full of witchy fun! Choose from 8 character options:<br></p>
<ul><li>Traditional Witch</li><li>Green Witch</li><li>Hedge Witch</li><li>Water Witch</li><li>Divination Witch</li><li>Cosmic Witch</li><li>Music Witch</li><li>Tech Witch</li></ul>
<p>Each witch specializes in a different skill, and is equipped with a unique magickal tool and wand.<br></p>
<p>Make the game as silly or as serious as you'd like, and celebrate our vibrant and diverse bi+ community.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1NDE3LzQwOTMwMzAucG5n/original/FoFPPs.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1NDE3LzQwOTMwMzEucG5n/original/mP5kyv.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1NDE3LzQwOTMwMzIucG5n/original/eDJKuB.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1NDE3LzQwOTMwMzYuanBn/original/3LrKhq.jpg]]






<p>You are a traveler seeking stories of the mysterious world around you. As you journey, you record the legends and folklore of the lands through which you travel. Where will you go and what stories will you tell?&nbsp;</p>
<p>This game is inspired by <a href="https://marchcrow.itch.io/over-the-mountain" target="_blank">Over the Mountain</a> by <a href="https://marchcrow.itch.io/" target="_blank">marchcrow</a> and was made for the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/one-page-hack-a-thon-2021" target="_blank">One-Page RPG Hackathon 2021</a><br></p>
<p></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2NDUxNTkuanBn/original/2Yr8cY.jpg]]






<p>Take to The Sea of Mischief and gamble your life away on high seas adventures as ratfolk pirates. Chase buried treasure, hunt wannabe pirate lords, and engage in some all together unsavory action in Bilge Rats: A Sea of Mischief. This 78 page guide has everything you need to get your adventures on The Sea of Mischief up and running--except for the d6 dice, cups, and pencils you're gonna need. So, dust off your tricorn caps, get your cutlass shined, and get ready to set sail!</p><p>"Awesome flavor, clever core concept, and a really fun time!" - Tintenseher<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNjM5MS84MjUyMDM4LmpwZw==/original/jbBzKT.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNjM5MS84MjUyMDM5LmpwZw==/original/N0ZzQp.jpg]]






<p>It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a bird in possession of good health must be in want of some dirt. <br></p>
<p>Birds Love Dirt! is a game about being a bird and loving dirt. It encourages you to get outside, imagine birdhood, and most importantly, play in some dirt. Or mud, sand, gravel, heck even snow would probably work! As long as you can interact with it as a bird and get messy, it's fair game. <br></p>
<p>The game is played in three phases, Exploration, Declaration, and Dirt. Some Variations are included to provide ideas for playing in a group, with children, or indoors.<br></p>
<p>If you can't afford this game, please claim a community copy! No conditions, no questions asked. I intend to keep them available for anyone who needs them.<br></p>
<p></p>
<p><em>This game is a direct result of my experience volunteering on Kuaihelani (Midway Atoll) and is dedicated with gratitude and love to all my friends there, especially my fellow peas. I miss our dance parties, baking together, quiet reading hangouts, and so much more. I'd also like to thank my friend Lizzie for reading my drafts, keeping me motivated to make this game the best it could be.<br></em></p>
<p></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODIzMDA0LzQ2NDE1MDYucG5n/original/HNAxLh.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODIzMDA0LzQ2NDE1MTMucG5n/original/FreoXV.png]]






<p><br></p>
<p>One by one the last stars are winking out and the true Black Hole Era approaches. A period of nearly endless stability around which your ancient civilization will quietly await the inevitable decay of protons, and the final oncoming darkness after quintillions of years. This almost eternal period of stability is interrupted by the formation of Star Scars, an unknown phenomena that rips apart some of the few remaining degenerate stellar remnants. From these scars pours forth an alien form of life determined to reignite the black holes, causing the death of untold digital beings, and the collapse of a civilization trillions of years of age.
</p>
<p><span class="">	</span>In this game you will portray one of the mighty vessels called into being to defend your home. Sentient and self aware, you are equipped with space bending engines, exotic energy weapons, and nanoscale fabricators for self repair. However, resources are scarce and must be scavenged from your foes or rationed carefully from the homeworld vaults. You will have to weigh the benefits of bringing home materials or using them in the field.
</p>
<p>&nbsp;Your missions will take you from diving into the scars left on the last few stars from these invaders, all the way to plumbing the depths of discarded dyson spheres from an epoch before this one. The last remaining stars must be extinguished and the alien invaders forced back from the edges of the event horizon you call home.&nbsp; Will you commit yourself to an endless siege, will you dive into the scarred stars themselves to strike back at the invaders? Or will you betray your entire civilization and allow the aliens to reignite the stellar furnaces, rolling back the clock and resetting the universe to an earlier more vigorous age?
</p>
<p>This game is Illuminated by LUMEN, based on the LUMEN RPG system designed by Spencer Campbell, Gila RPGs. This game is in no way affiliated with Spencer Campbell or Gila RPGs.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTExNjIxMC82NzE4NTkyLmpwZw==/original/XEQo5p.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTExNjIxMC82NzE4NTk0LmpwZw==/original/5viN7c.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTExNjIxMC82NzE4NTk2LmpwZw==/original/%2F8sjKw.jpg]]






<h3 class="text-center">This project was made&nbsp;while visiting Yamatji country,&nbsp;<br>and the lands of the&nbsp;Amangu people.<br><em></em>Their Sovereignty should be honoured.<br>Always Was, Always Will Be.</h3>
<p class="text-center">***</p>
<p class="text-center"><strong><em><em></em><em><strong>Taskforce Babylon</strong></em>
<br>
</em></strong><em>a small unit of special forces soldiers tasked<br> with denying the enemy use of their mech suits.
<br>
</em><em>Alone in enemy territory for 5 hard months.
<br>
</em><em>Their success came at a heavy cost.
<br>
</em><em>Only 3 fireteams remain.</em>
</p>
<p class="text-center"><em>Now they face one more daring raid,
<br>
</em><em>against the infamous&nbsp;</em><strong><em>Black Sky Garrison.
<br>
</em></strong><em>Home to the enemies most gifted pilots,
<br>
</em><em>and their next gen mech suits.</em>
</p>
<p class="text-center"><strong><em>Babylon&nbsp;</em></strong><em>must destroy&nbsp;</em><strong><em>Black Sky&nbsp;</em></strong><em>at all cost.<br><br>***</em></p><p>Sprinty Award winning game, BSFB was described by the judges as:</p><p><em>"[...] A really cool design, [that] manages to achieve a hardbitten, technical feel through sleek "wizard's duel" style mechanics."</em></p>
<h2 class="text-center">
What Kind Of Game Is This?</h2>
<p class="text-center">Black Skies For Babylon is&nbsp;an asymmetrical co-op combat tragedy.<br>A new entry in my series of games exploring mech fiction.<br>This time the focus is on Taskforce Babylon.<br>&nbsp;Spec Ops soldiers infiltrating an enemy mech base to destroy their advanced prototype machines,<br> before they can be deployed.<br>1 person plays the Garrison defending the mechs, the others play 1 of 3 fireteams there to destroy them.<br>It's rules are simple, open-ended, and easy to learn.</p>
<p class="text-center"><br>This game uses dice pools of d6s, map drawing, and collaboration to tell a tragic story.<br>It explores themes of War, Death, Sacrifice, and the Cost of Victory.</p>
<p class="text-center">BSFB is formatted to fit a trifold brochure, <br>as such the order of pages might look odd in the pdf reader.<br></p>
<p class="text-center"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc0NDQxMjIucG5n/original/eGXz3h.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p class="text-center"><em>If you would like to hack this game or make a new fireteam for it<br>I give you my blessing as long as you acknowledge the original creator (me)<br>Also No Fascists, No TERFS, No Libertarians.<br></em><br></p>
<p class="text-center"><span></span></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc0NDQxMjgucG5n/original/YGtxQh.png]]






<p><strong><a href="https://peachgardengames.itch.io/blazing-hymn-quickstart">Free Quickstart Player Guide and Character Sheet are Here</a></strong></p>
<h2>Chorus of Devastation</h2>
<p><em>Humanity, it seems, has lived on this planet long enough.</em></p>
<p><em>At first, when we called them Angels, we meant it. Their flawless crystalline forms caught the sunlight in dazzling colors, and their radiance set our hearts at ease. These otherworldly creatures didn‚Äôt come from any planet we could identify, but we knew the second we set eyes on them that they came from somewhere beyond us.
  </em></p>
<p><em>Then the slaughter began.   </em></p>
<p><em>Soon, we spat the word ‚ÄúAngel‚Äù with a thick, poisonous irony heavy with grief and terror. Their attacks didn‚Äôt seem random ‚Äì in the middle of our largest and proudest cities, they showed their blades and showered the land in their poison. They flashed into existence like exquisite kaleidoscopes, and everyone they touched died. Earth creatures ‚Äì ourselves included ‚Äì crumple at their touch, dead in instants.   </em></p>
<p><em>Where Angels have gone, nothing will live. The air shimmers like an oil-slick in all the colors of the rainbow, and the very grass withers. There is a lingering sound, faint but detectable by sensors, like the ringing of a struck wine-glass.   </em></p>
<p><em>Now, we call them Angels literally. We know what they are.   </em></p>
<p><em>They have come from Heaven to massacre us.
  </em></p>
<p><em>We will not let them.</em>
</p>
<h2>About Blazing Hymn</h2>
<p>Inspired by Neon Genesis Evangelion and Senki Zesshou Symphogear, this action-heavy TTRPG takes you to a future where music is humanity's only weapon against the armies of Heaven.</p>
<p>Will yours be a song of pride? Of violence? Of regret?</p>
<p>Build a Hymnal unit, a music-powered anti-Angel battlesuit, and take on missions to protect humanity from destruction. The songs you choose will change how you play, protect you from damage, help you build up power and protect your teammates.</p>
<p>When you sing, you generate Gain, a force used to power your Hymnal unit itself as well as unleash a wide array of flashy moves and daring attacks.</p>
<p>The Blazing Hymn manual includes a sample mission, including a map, and several Angels you can use in your own stories.</p>
<h2>About Lumen</h2>
<figure><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzYxOTAwNjAucG5n/original/mZJB7p.png" style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit" alt="Illuminated By Lumen" title="Illuminated By Lumen" loading="lazy"><figcaption>The Illuminated by Lumen logo</figcaption><span></span><br></figure>
<p>Blazing Hymn is built using the Lumen system, a fast-paced action SRD built by <a href="https://gilarpgs.itch.io/lumen">GilaRPGs.</a>&nbsp;It's played with a GM and a small party, ideally 3-4 players.</p>
<p>Conflict resolution involves rolling d6s, and in Blazing Hymn, there will be 3 at most.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Because the Lumen system is frantic and tactical, a map is recommended so that players can easily see where they are compared to enemies and allies.&nbsp;<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA3OTI3NS82MTg5OTk4LmpwZw==/original/rFKRrv.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA3OTI3NS82MTkwMDAwLmpwZw==/original/pypXAD.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA3OTI3NS82MTkwMDAxLmpwZw==/original/aYQDIP.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA3OTI3NS82MTkwMDAzLmpwZw==/original/GC0FEK.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA3OTI3NS82MTkwMDA1LmpwZw==/original/HMJFky.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA3OTI3NS82MTkwMDA3LmpwZw==/original/m%2FjFZo.jpg]]






<p>The world of&nbsp;<em>Bleak Spirit</em>&nbsp;is one of majesty and mystery, where the landscape looms vast and conceals manifold cryptic secrets. The twisted descendants of ancient civilisations live among the faded glories of their forebears, pursuing arcane agendas indecipherable to outsiders. And in primordial woods and swamps, fabled treasures and long-forgotten sorceries lie guarded by deadly monsters both fearsome and noble.</p>
<p>This world is gloomy, desolate, lonely -- but also beautiful. Long-abandoned fortress ruins still stand as awe-inspiring testament to the might and vision of their creators. Beside the hungry beasts that prowl the forests, flowers grow, picked out by rays of sunlight glancing through the leaves.</p>
<p>Into this world comes a wanderer, a lone traveller from somewhere else who bears a heavy destiny.</p>
<p><em>Bleak Spirit</em>&nbsp;is their story.</p>
<p>---</p>
<p><em>Bleak Spirit</em> is a 2-5 player tabletop RPG which uses a rotating GM system to create a truly collaborative story. No one knows what's really going on until the very last scenes!<br></p>
<p>No dice or cards are necessary to play this game -- a set of special cards could be useful, but aren't required. All you need is the pdf, something to write with, and something to write on.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzI3NDQ0NDUucG5n/original/Zk%2FzBl.png]]






<p>Welcome to BORP Survival Guide originally a zine from 2013 that was hand printed.&nbsp;</p>
<p>What is BORP? BORP is a card game with a few skills and a few other character definitions. Its meant to be a quick to make and play ttrpg. Skills are to boost stats. The stats are the big definer of what you do.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Survival Guide: How to survive Undead, Aliens, Monsters and Myths is a game of fighting to make sure that humanity is able to continue on.&nbsp;</p>
<p>As a group or just the game runner can use the Apocalypse sheet to figure out the basics of what is ending. There is a sub sheet for each of the following Undead, Aliens, Monsters and Myths. There are rules for creating them from scratch or you can use the pre generator ones in the back of the book.</p>
<p>Undead - This is for the most part zombies with influences from video games, movies, tv and anime. There are basic types and mutations that are heavily influenced from games like resident evil and left for dead series.</p>
<p>Aliens - From greys and little greens to being influenced by the covenant from halo there are many forms of invasions they can do.</p>
<p>Monsters - What if someone moved a rock and a whole army of Sasquatches came pouring out of a cave? What if a whole stat was overrun by Chupacabras?&nbsp;Monsters is about taking classic stories, cryptids and making them a more prevalent issue than what they have been said before.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Myths - What if you found a maze that had minotuars still inside? What if you found loki in a classroom? This form has some older beliefs written up as world ending events.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>What do you get for $10.00?</p>
<p>There are two sizes small print and large print. Small print is meant to look how the original version looked. Large print was made to keep this look as best as possible. The modules will also be a part of the $10.00 as they come out. Small print is 32 pages total and large print is 45 pages total.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>VTT Support!</p>
<p><a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/6de6ebc1-borp-survival/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/6de6ebc1-borp-survival/save</a></p>
<p> <a href="http://www.playrole.com" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">www.playrole.com</a></p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Other VTT support will come. Roles support for creators is amazing so all of our games get support on Role first!. We will add the links to the PDFs as well.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Coming Soon: Modules!</p>
<p>The original game modules have been lost but many of the notes from the playtests still exist and will be turned into a module. Below are blurbs on what they are about. See you soon.</p>
<p>Eyes of the Overlords - A module about alien invaders who steal the bodies of humans. There are aliens who have come to save us as well. You play as either a member of the town, a member of the science team sent in to save folks, a soldier escorting the science team or someone who is part alien. You can choose to be from either alien species.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Its not just a video game? - A module about zombie infestation inspired by zombie video games. This takes place in a small farming town. You play as either someone from the town trying to survive or a member of a rescue team. This is for 2 to 7 folks with one person as the Deal Keeper and the rest as players.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>ITCHFUNDING</p>
<p>The game is complete but we want to make it better.&nbsp;We are raising money to hire folks to help us redo the book with editing, writing and art. This book was originally written in 2013 and has been consolidated from different playtest notes. This game will continue to be worked on and improved but will keep its original nature. The layout is almost the same as the original. Inside are notes for what is different between the versions out in the wild and here.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzY1MzM5NDIuanBn/original/x2EmWi.jpg]]






<p><span class="">Branching Streams is a supplement to <a href="https://ehronlime.itch.io/an-altogether-different-river">An Altogether Different River</a> which collects several Game Seeds for the game plus a couple of hacks. You will need a copy of An Altogether Different River to use with the materials presented here.</span>
</p>
<p><span class="">In addition to expanding the original 4 Game Seeds from An Altogether Different River, this supplement includes 4 new Game Seeds. Two of the new Game Seeds are from guest contributors <a href="https://babblegumsam.itch.io/">Samuel Mui Shen Ern</a> and <a href="https://notrueindian.itch.io/">Thomas Manuel.</a><br></span></p>
<p><span class=""><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3MDIzMTcucG5n/original/LSl7oI.png" loading="lazy"><br></span></p>
<p><span class="">I've also invited fellow game designers <a href="https://breathingstories.itch.io/">Logan Timmins</a> and <a href="https://crimsonstripes.itch.io/">Rick Chia</a> to&nbsp; contribute a new variant for the ending of the game, and a substantive hack of An Altogether Different River.</span><span class=""> </span>
</p>
<p><span class=""><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3MDIzMTMucG5n/original/81Q%2F%2FO.png" loading="lazy"><br></span></p>
<p><span class="">I'm also really happy to work with Venessa Tang again on the cover and artwork, keeping with the tone and feel of the original game.<br></span></p>
<p></p>
<p><span class=""><em>A town isn't just one thing.<br></em></span></p>
<p><span class=""><em>There is no way for us to understand all that there was, is, and could be in any one location and claim to say we know what that place is.<br></em></span></p>
<p><span class=""><em>A town is the sum and multiplicity of its people, its myriad histories and realities, a confluence of overlapping worlds.<br></em></span></p>
<p><span class=""><em>All the motion of water and life and death flowing through what we foolishly attempt to call one river.</em></span>
</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTMyNDQ4NS83NzAyMTM1LnBuZw==/original/sJ6s1z.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTMyNDQ4NS83NzAyMTM3LnBuZw==/original/OTFmM%2B.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTMyNDQ4NS83NzAyMTM2LnBuZw==/original/rOgLfb.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTMyNDQ4NS83NzAyMTM4LnBuZw==/original/gmQ3pZ.png]]






<p>Earth is at war w/ The Colonies.<br>...<br>Mech pilots must keep their identities secret or risk assassination.<br>...<br>You just realized your lover has been secretly piloting your rival mech.<br>...<br>It all comes down to this battle.<br>...<br>Do you want to keep fighting?</p>
<p><br>Humanity reaches ever toward the stars, though there are some who demand we keep our feet solidly on Earth‚Äôs crust. In this future we reach into Heaven and kill our gods. In their place we build Mecha, unbelievably large mobile suits, capable of inflicting grievous harm. These monsters of war require pilots, but not everyone can handle the strenuous neural load required to move these divine robots. Mecha pilots must be intense, dramatic, and most importantly, secret. The first generation of Mecha pilots were all killed in their sleep, slaughtered by both opposing factions in a wash of interstellar blood. You are one of the Second Generation, Mecha pilots who keep your roles hidden from the world and from those you love.</p>
<p>This is a roleplaying game for two Mecha pilots who do not know yet that their mortal enemy sleeps by their side every night. You will need a deck of Poker cards and two index cards to play this game.</p>
<p>If the price of this game is a hardship to you, please email me at Taylor@RiverhouseGames.com or DM me on Twitter @LeviathanFiles and I'll get you a download key, no questions asked.<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzE4NTEwNDIucG5n/original/TlQof6.png]]






<p>You're pupils at a British secondary school, trying to keep life at least a bit interesting and make your own entertainment. Build a den in the rafters of the gym. Raise terrapins in the third-floor bathroom. Brew moonshine with the long-banned solvents in the arts room. Arrange charity concerts. Steal test answers from the Head's safe while disguised as a Swedish piano-tuner. Stage a rebellion against school dinners. Find buried treasure under the rugby pitch. Arrest your physics teacher as a spy. Hide sickly aliens in the lockers. Plot bank robberies. Concoct elaborate schemes to bump into your crush. Bend, not break, the rules. Try different ways to make a difference to the days.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgyNTYyNjcucG5n/original/NmDwDO.png]]






<p>Bucket bash is a monster bashing, candy snatching, trick or treat game for 3-6 players. Grab a bucket filled with candy, dress in your favorite Halloween costume, and hit the streets in search of the perfect Spooky Night&nbsp;Score!</p>
<p>This download contains 16 pages of rules, including a printable sheet of candy tokens, if eating candy is not something you'd like to do.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Join our discord and ask for help with any confusion, or questions!&nbsp;
</p>
<p><a href="https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://discord.gg/BGspufbQeG</a>
</p>
<p><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIxMjk4NS83MDc3NTExLnBuZw==/original/wlngNI.png]]






<p>Welcome to Mad Science 202. Your first group assignment will be building a B.O.I.O.- Body of Indeterminable Origin.&nbsp;</p>
<p>A simple ttrpg, grab a friend and roll a D20 (or any other dice you like!) and build yourself a friend, a loved one, whoever you like!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzcyMjgzMDQucG5n/original/9B3uiF.png]]






<p>A short game for ttrpg content creators. This is fairly tongue in cheek, I hope you enjoy it.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3NTU4MjQucG5n/original/MbtfsG.png]]






<p class="text-center"><strong>!! CONTENT WARNING !!</strong></p>
<p class="text-center">BURNOUT REAPER is about HARVESTING ORGANS. It contains gore, violence and cruelty as well as references to Drugs, Suicide and other horrors. Deeply consider whether or not this game is right for you and your table.</p>
<p><strong><br></strong></p>
<p class="text-center"><strong>It is the dystopic far-future of 2 0 2 2&nbsp;</strong></p>
<p class="text-center">Advanced Supercities have exploded with new technologies. Factories on their outskirts choke the remnants of the ecosystem. Wealth disparity has hit an all time high. The cost of living greatly outpaces average wages.</p>
<p class="text-center"><strong>Fresh organs are worth more than human life.</strong></p>
<p class="text-center">You are a Reaper, harvesting whatever Organs the Reapr‚Ñ¢ app tells you to. It‚Äôs a cruel and dangerous job, but you have Bills to pay.&nbsp;</p>
<p class="text-center"><strong>CALLOUS your Heart. Ready your WILL.&nbsp;</strong></p>
<p class="text-center"><strong>Submit to CAPITAL or enter OBLIVION.</strong></p><p></p>
<p><strong>BURNOUT REAPER</strong> is a game where Players will take on the roll of Organ Reapers, desperate to pay their Bills and working through the Gig App <em>Reapr‚Ñ¢.&nbsp;</em>They'll have to harvest whatever organs the app tells them, as their WILL slowly trickles down in this grim death spiral of a one-shot.</p>
<p>The game is intended to be brutal, brief and immensely extra. Player sheets take up only half a page and the rules fit on a double-sided trifold. Packed in these spaces are the rules for figuring out your Reaper's CALLOUS, SOOTHE and BILL. These Reapers will also be at the whims of a constantly SHIFTING MARKET, since they are exclusively paid in CYBER CRYPTO but their BILLS must be paid in AUTHORITY CREDIT.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The&nbsp;<strong>WANING WILL</strong> System powers this Death Spiral. It allows Reapers to roll however many D6s their WILL allows to pass checks, but any 1s will result in a permanent loss of 1 WILL.&nbsp; Hit Zero WILL and your Reaper DIES.</p>
<p><strong>WHAT IS INCLUDED:</strong></p>
<p>- Reaper Character Sheets</p>
<p>-&nbsp;Trifold Rules Sheet with Random Roll Tables and Runner Advice</p>
<p><strong>YOU WILL NEED:</strong></p>
<p>- 1 Game Runner to bring this grim world to life</p>
<p>- Players to become Reapers (Recommended 2-4)</p>
<p>- 12d6 (Preferably Per Player)</p>
<p><strong>WHO IS THIS FOR?</strong></p>
<p>Groups looking for ruthless one-shots who are interested in exploring the&nbsp;horrors of late-stage Americana capitalism. It is intended for Players and Game Runners who already have some literacy with Tabletop Games, and are looking for something relatively Rules-Light.</p>
<p><strong>WRITING,&nbsp;DESIGN, LAYOUT&nbsp; BY </strong><a href="https://alessandroad.carrd.co/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"><strong>SANRO</strong></a></p>
<p><strong>COVER ART BY TEAPAK ON <a href="https://twitter.com/teapak_prime" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">TWITTER</a> AND </strong><a href="https://www.patreon.com/teapak" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"><strong>PATREON</strong></a></p>
<p><br></p>
<p><br></p>
<p class="text-center"><strong><em>!! PLEASE NOTE: THE GAME IS AVAILABLE FOR FREE THROUGH THE COMMUNITY COPIES PROGRAM!! PLEASE BE CAUTIOUS AND DO NOT ACCIDENTALLY BUY THIS!! THE INTENTION OF MAKING IT $250+ IS TO MAKE IT PROHIBITIVELY EXPENSIVE TO FORCE PEOPLE TO TAKE COMMUNITY COPIES AND PARTICIPATE IN TAKING SOMETHING GIVEN FREELY!! NOT FOR YOU TO SPEND $250 ON THIS!! DO NOT BUY THIS!! !!</em></strong></p>
<p></p>
<p><br><strong></strong></p>
<p class="text-center">If you'd like to support this game, leave a rating and comment with your thoughts!!</p>
<p class="text-center">If you'd like to offer&nbsp;monetary support towards my work, consider buying or donating to one of my other games!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI2MTY1MS83NDk5MzM3LnBuZw==/original/g7rodc.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI2MTY1MS83NDk5MzI2LmpwZw==/original/eJar9x.jpg]]






<p>Fried food, farm animals and armpit-to-armpit humanity welcome you to the State Fair.<br></p>
<p>Nestled within, ninety pounds of grade-A butter has been hand-sculpted into the likeness of the Butter Princess, and you have an interest in the fate of that representation of Midwestern royalty.</p>
<p>A weekend here may let you&nbsp;forget your weekday.</p>
<p>::</p>
<p>Butter Princess is an incursion rooted in Trophy Dark.&nbsp; The core rules of Trophy Dark are contained within.&nbsp; Theme:&nbsp;Indulgence.</p>
<p>This is a play-to-lose collaborative horror RPG&nbsp;in a&nbsp;modern setting at a State Fair.</p>
<p>::</p>
<p>Now with a stunning online character keeper by Arktosaur.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzUxNjIyLzYzNzc0OTEucG5n/original/xfq0hL.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzUxNjIyLzYzNzc0OTcucG5n/original/wVUjLF.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzUxNjIyLzYzNzc0OTgucG5n/original/D6ATgR.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzUxNjIyLzYzNzc1ODIuanBn/original/XdoMtL.jpg]]






<p><em>A jagged but lush coastline, equally comprised of verdant growth and storm-grey cliffs.&nbsp;Powerful rains that pummel fishing boats but nourish the bountiful farms further inland.&nbsp;And nestled in a natural harbor, presiding over aquamarine waters and dangerous reefs, the&nbsp;city Pheles. Pheles is the jewel in the crown of the country Praecia, but its glittering streets&nbsp;and equally colorful courtiers give it the name it is more often called: the Butterfly Court.&nbsp;Ruled by the enigmatic Eyotalas, the Butterfly Court is a knotted web of debts, whims,&nbsp;fancies, and rivalries. While many may dismiss the courtiers of the Butterfly Court as&nbsp;frivolous nobles and their hangers-on, their action nonetheless determine the fate of&nbsp;Praecia. And with the ambitious Queen Yora in control of the neighboring country Asmary,&nbsp;the peasants agitating for more rights, and the mysterious woodkin stirring intrigues in&nbsp;</em><em>their own mythic court, that fate seems more uncertain than ever.</em></p>
<p>In Butterfly Court, you will play as a member of the titular Butterfly Court, the court of the&nbsp;monarchy of the kingdom Praecia. This is a court intrigue game that uses the No Dice No Masters system, based on Avery Alder's Belonging Outside Belonging games. If you're not familiar with those, don't worry - everything you need to know is right here in the game document. This is a storytelling, roleplaying game, where players portray members of a court, but not necessarily the monarch or the heir. Instead, the game focuses on everyday lives, intrigue, relationships, obligations, and myriad other concerns of the regular people in the court: nobles, but also staff, servants, artists, and other people that make court life possible.</p>
<p>If the price of the game is a financial obstacle for you, there are community copies available! Please reach out to me here, at my Twitter (@MishaGrifka), or at my email (you can find it on Google) to request a community copy. If you are doing well financially, consider paying a little more to cover those who cannot! And if you have any questions about the game, you can also get in touch - I'd be happy to help out.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM1MjIyOS83ODcxNDQyLmpwZw==/original/s7g5wU.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM1MjIyOS83ODcxMzM1LnBuZw==/original/wLZqZJ.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM1MjIyOS83ODcxMzM2LnBuZw==/original/ACfyEx.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM1MjIyOS83ODcxMzM3LnBuZw==/original/ZQ7piq.png]]






<p>North of the mighty River of Sighs and south of the formidable Ploughshare Mountains, lies the Swordlands. A series of fertile valleys and lush forests, the Swordlands is primarily inhabited by an enchanted nation known as The Monarchy.</p>
<p>The Monarchy lives in harmony with the land, having crafted towering halls and grand palaces out of risen earth and living wood---both of which flow and reform like molten stone at the touch of the Monarchy's craftwrights.</p>
<p>By all accounts, resources in the Swordlands are plentiful, art and learning are embraced by all, and foreign invaders are scarce to be seen.</p>
<p>But all is not well here.</p>
<p>Minor factions, united by little more than common bitterness, are fighting in the hills and dales. They duel with magics, with song, and even with the ornamental blades that every member of the Monarchy receives at her birth.</p>
<p>But why do they fight?</p>
<p>Well, unfortunately...</p>
<h1>Every Single One Is In Line For The Throne</h1>
<p>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>
<p>Butterfly Princesses is a 12 page, full-color, mini-trpg about folks with wings and blades disagreeing over matters of succession.</p>
<p>It is played with 2--6 friends and some dice---which you throw.</p>
<p>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></p>
<p><strong>Physical Game Mechanics Note:</strong>&nbsp;Conflicts in the game are resolved by Curling: throwing dice into a ring and trying to knock your opponent's dice out. If you'd prefer not to do this for any reason, you can roll your dice instead. 3s equal 1 point, 4s equal 2 points, 5s equal 3 points, 6s equal&nbsp;4 points.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxMTgyLzc0MzM4NTYucG5n/original/S5v5kl.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxMTgyLzU4NDE3NzEucG5n/original/NHWOMh.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxMTgyLzU4NDE3NzIucG5n/original/xTXhWX.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxMTgyLzU4NDE3NzQucG5n/original/I%2FvIJo.png]]






<p><strong>Build it. Develop it. Analyze it. End it.</strong></p>
<p>You are a team of scientists working together in search of the answer to mankind's greatest existential question:&nbsp;are we alone in the universe?&nbsp; Explore this question by building your own unique solar system, developing a spacecraft to probe one planet, analyze the data transmitted back, and conclude the mission by terminating your spacecraft.</p>
<p>C A S S 1 N 1 is a 2-4 player space exploration game designed by <a href="http://twitter.com/gnomedic" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Joey "Gnomedic" Barranco</a> and edited by <a href="http://twitter.com/unmadegaming" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Michael Hunt</a>. Photography by NASA/JPL-CALTECH/Space Science Institute and used under Public Domain.&nbsp;Developed for <a href="https://itch.io/jam/end-jam" target="_blank">#EndJam2019</a><span></span>.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>***WARNING FIRE HAZARD: This game involves setting paper on fire. Please use extreme caution and practice appropriate safety measures. Adult supervision is required. By downloading and/or playing C A S S 1 N 1, you agree that the makers of this game cannot be held liable for any injuries or damages sustained while playing this game. Play at your own risk.<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTA2Njk3LzI2NzIyMjYucG5n/original/%2BJpKIa.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTA2Njk3LzI2MzQyNTkuanBn/original/K8kGgz.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTA2Njk3LzI2MzQyNjEuanBn/original/DpmX7C.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTA2Njk3LzI2MzQyNjAuanBn/original/tPbWuA.jpg]]






<p><em>It‚Äôs your first Spring Break as a college student! You and your friends have decided to rent a beach house together and celebrate the old fashioned way. The music is great, the booze is flowing, and everyone is gorgeous. What‚Äôs a freshie to do?</em></p>
<p><em>Why, eat cake by the ocean, of course!</em></p>
<p><strong>Cake By The Ocean</strong> is an American Freeform LARP for at least one facilitator and seven players. It can be played at a convention in four hours or over a weekend at a beach house.&nbsp;</p>
<p>All you need is a cake.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzI5ODI2NDUucG5n/original/Epf1Vd.png]]






<p><strong>A one-shot horror game compatible with Trophy Dark.</strong><br></p>
<p>Candlelight is a role playing game about the restless spirits of treasure hunters reckoning with their dark past and seeking hope in a haunted forest that wants to trap them there. It is a&nbsp;<strong>one-shot</strong>,&nbsp;<strong>rules-light</strong>&nbsp;game, focusing on collaborative and thematic storytelling and is designed to be flexible in how you bring it to the table:</p>
<ul><li>An&nbsp;<strong>epilogue</strong>&nbsp;for any fantasy game following character death - especially a TPK!</li><li>A world-building&nbsp;<strong>prologue</strong>&nbsp;for any game exploring a haunted place</li><li>A stand-alone game exploring themes of dark fantasy and supernatural horror - with a glimmering of hope and redemption.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<p>Candlelight is&nbsp;<a href="https://trophyrpg.com/system/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Rooted in Trophy</a>, using the core system of&nbsp;<a href="https://trophyrpg.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Trophy Dark</a>&nbsp;to tell a story of desperate characters pushing their luck in a place that constantly threatens to overwhelm them. The key difference here is that the characters have already met their doom - while Trophy Dark progresses through a series of Rings and escalating horror, Candlelight starts at that final Ring where the characters have just died. It is at the dark heart of the forest that they will begin their journey, retracing the steps they took while living, seeking hope and an escape from the forest before they become a monstrosity that haunts it forever.</p>
<p>Candlelight is compatible with any of the&nbsp;incursions (scenarios) from Trophy Dark. Detailed instructions are included for adapting your favorite Trophy Dark incursion for Candlelight, and any character creation options from Trophy are easily transferrable to Candlelight.</p>
<p>Here is the Candlelight playlist, including the theme song written specifically for the game, Dirge of the Lost:</p>
<p><iframe src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/playlist/5VAbKdJpFKRV2Jdk5brmxU" width="300" height="380" frameborder="0"></iframe><br></p>
<p>Reviews:</p>
<p><em>"After a game of Trophy Dark where everyone dies, Candlelight is the perfect answer to the question: What now? And not only is the answer elegant and satisfying, it provides a surprising point of light in a world otherwise wrapped in darkness. Fans of ghost stories of all kinds will find much to love in Candlelight."&nbsp;</em></p>
<p>-<strong>Jesse Ross,</strong>&nbsp;Creator of the Trophy RPG</p>
<p><em>‚ÄúGabriel is a terrific, evocative writer. There‚Äôs a lot of poetry in everything he writes, and I can‚Äôt wait to see Candlelight.‚Äù&nbsp;&nbsp;</em></p>
<p>-<strong>Jason Cordova</strong>, Founder of The Gauntlet&nbsp;</p>
<p>"Having played now, smolderingly good.  As in breathtaking moments of "Oh, so this is what it is to be a human, and here is what I will miss once I'm gone" good."&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>-Brian Sago</strong></p>
<p></p>
<p>Read a&nbsp;<strong>preview</strong>&nbsp;of Candlelight by <strong>Clayton Notestine</strong> on&nbsp;<strong>The Explorer's Company</strong>&nbsp;here:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.theexplorersco.com/home/2020/candlelight/zinequest" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://www.theexplorersco.com/home/2020/candlelight/zinequest</a><br></p>
<p>Actual Plays:</p>
<p>Listen to Gabriel run a game of Candlelight on the <a href="https://www.youarenotalonepod.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">You Are Not Alone podcast</a>:</p>
<p>Part 1:&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.youarenotalonepod.com/podcast/episode/7e2bb220/candlelight-featuring-gabriel-robinson-part-1" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://www.youarenotalonepod.com/podcast/episode/7e2bb220/candlelight-featuring...</a></p>
<p>Part 2: <a href="https://www.youarenotalonepod.com/podcast/episode/944f221c/candlelight-featuring-gabriel-robinson-part-2" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://www.youarenotalonepod.com/podcast/episode/944f221c/candlelight-featuring...</a><br></p>
<p><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzAyMjE2LzM4NzU0OTMucG5n/original/Ht%2B5zU.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzAyMjE2LzM4NzU0OTQucG5n/original/KxCFaz.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzAyMjE2LzM4OTIzMDIucG5n/original/uF3y7I.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzAyMjE2LzM4OTIzMDQucG5n/original/%2FJC2wm.png]]






<p>Card Fantasy(ASHCAN) is a quick ttrpg that's meant to be a one shot, short campaign or a filler between campaigns or games while the game runner plans out materials. <br></p>
<p>Card Fantasy offers a simple toolkit for playing any type of fantasy game. Using cards instead of dice for quick play and smooth action.</p>
<p>What is an ashcan edition? This is an early release version we want to add more to and the funds we make will help us add to the game. We plan to add audio files with someone reading the book. We will also rewrite the rules to be newer gamer friendly. We also plan to add more art work too.<br></p>
<p>Additional community copies will be added for every purchase over the base price, and for every rating.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br>NOW includes low resolution version and a hi resolution version. Along with updated enemy rules, separate reference sheets in letter size for easier printing.</p>
<p>Role Character Sheet -&nbsp;<a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/fb32bd83-card-fantasy-character-sheet/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/fb32bd83-card-fantasy-character-sheet/s...</a></p>
<p>Role World Sheet -&nbsp;<a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/6f587422-card-fantasy-world-sheet/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/6f587422-card-fantasy-world-sheet/save</a></p>
<p><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgxNTA0NzUuanBn/original/N1%2FU2s.jpg]]






<h2>Print copies available&nbsp;<a href="https://www.exaltedfuneral.com/products/cast-away" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">in the US</a> &amp; <a href="https://rattiincantati.com/products/cast-away-pdf" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Canada</a>!</h2>
<p><strong>Cast Away is the definitive tabletop survival RPG</strong>. Its Diminishing&nbsp;Dice mechanics reflect the ever-worsening condition of survivors in the aftermath of a disaster‚Äîwithout tracking Hit Points or burdensome injury tables. Death is permanent,&nbsp;therefore, we've created a Haunting system that keeps players engaged long after their characters pass away. Cast Away contains a modular set of guidelines and is&nbsp;easily adapted to any setting, environment, or circumstance.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Your purchase includes:</p>
<blockquote>- Survivor's &amp; Navigator's Guide<br>- Drop-in Survival Scenario<br>- Printer Friendly&nbsp;Character Sheets<br>- 3 BONUS Adventures</blockquote>
<h2>Bonus Adventures:</h2>
<h3><a href="https://afterthought-committee.itch.io/brain-food" target="_blank">Brain Food</a>&nbsp;- A zombie apocalypse
</h3>
<h3><a href="https://afterthought-committee.itch.io/ground-control" target="_blank">Ground Control</a>&nbsp;- A space odyssey
</h3>
<h3><a href="https://afterthought-committee.itch.io/cursed-crystal" target="_blank">Cursed Crystal</a>&nbsp;- A fantasy escape
</h3>
<p></p>
<h2><div class=""><iframe width="500" height="281" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JLggU2QgSWM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe></div></h2>
<h2></h2>
<h2>What do you need to play?</h2>
<p>Cast Away is a tabletop RPG. You'll need: <br> 2+ Players &amp; at least one set of Polyhedral Dice (minus the d20)&nbsp;</p>
<h3><u>Credits</u></h3>
<p><strong></strong>Written by Joe O'Brien &amp; Reilly Qyote<br>Layout &amp; Design by Reilly Qyote<br><em>Special Thanks To:&nbsp;</em><br>B, Levimax, Clint, <a href="https://quorumofsand.itch.io/" target="_blank">Matthew K</a>, and <a href="https://rugose-kohn.itch.io/" target="_blank">Rugose Kohn</a><br> for all your support and inspiration.<br><br><u><strong>We‚Äôd&nbsp;love to hear from you!</strong></u></p>
<p>If you have stories to share, want to give us feedback, or just wanna chat about RPGs, feel free to drop us a line at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:afterthoughtcommittee@gmail.com" style="font-size: inherit" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">afterthoughtcommittee@gmail.com</a>.</p>
<p>Sometimes we make stuff on&nbsp;<a href="http://twitch.tv/afterthoughtgames" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Twitch</a>.<br><br>Track us down on <a href="https://discord.gg/d5nh2bHPNP" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Discord</a>.<br></p>

<iframe width="720" height="450" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JLggU2QgSWM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODY4MTc3LzUzMjQ3NjQuanBn/original/O0ft1z.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODY4MTc3LzQ5MTU5OTUuanBn/original/fy5ARw.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODY4MTc3LzQ5MDg5NzcuanBn/original/3%2BMD1J.jpg]]






<p><strong><u>W</u></strong><strong><u>hat is Cavehaven?</u></strong></p>
<p>Cavehaven, home to the Goblins of Kokono Village, is comprised of a network of caves stacked on top of and beneath the wide open cavern the Goblins have cleared out and built their home in. Seeking shelter from what they call <em>the Brightblight,</em> the Goblins of Kokono are content to hide from predators, and more importantly from the humans of the surface, in the damp shade of sheltering stone, deep below the mountains.</p>
<p>Cavehaven is both a tiny, goblincore fantasy setting with a diverse cast of colorful characters, and also a dungeon-crawling adventure that takes players through a complex cave system with its own ecosystem and dangers. Follow a&nbsp;simple adventure and uncover an alarming schism in reality itself that hints at the tragic history of a much greater world in peril!</p>
<p>You could plant Cavehaven into just about any mountain range in any game and fantasy world you like, but it also serves as the introduction to a broader setting I've been working on for a while that I&nbsp;will expand upon in future projects.</p>
<p><a href="https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4wNyRXMkix24jndVZ3wKw5?si=89454761f98744f8&amp;nd=1" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"><strong>Playlist by Sam Leigh</strong></a><strong> </strong>(25 minutes, 27 seconds)</p>
<p><strong><u><em>When</em> is Cavehaven?</u></strong></p>
<p>C<span style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit">avehaven is still </span><strong style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit">in-development</strong><span style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit">. By supporting development today you lock in your copy of Cavehaven, with any and all potentially additional content added, for the lowest price possible!</span></p>
<p>I am around 99% finished with the contents of the ashcan version of&nbsp;Cavehaven (complete beta product will clock in as a 24pg 5.5 x 8.5 Booklet&nbsp;including the front, back, and inside covers).</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://www.getrevue.co/profile/valkyrie_sknave" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Sign up for my newsletter</a></strong> to receive updates about development!&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong><u>Outro &amp; Credits</u></strong><br></p>
<p>Play as goblins who have found yourselves mysteriously in the quaint, hidden village of Kokono and discover the barest hints at a much,&nbsp;<em>much</em> larger world populated by fantastic beasts, monstrous humans, and limitless wonders. Explore the secrets of this Cavehaven, discover the magic of the Wisps, and uncover a timeless tragedy of rage and grief that could unravel everything.</p>
<p>Featuring art from the extremely talented&nbsp;Fay Lane (@faera_lane), Raul Volpato (@raul_volp), Alex Dameceno (@GnarledMonster), and @waiweiko!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM0ODY3OS83ODcxNDcxLmpwZw==/original/QLRzaA.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM0ODY3OS83ODQ5NzcwLmpwZw==/original/4en%2BzH.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM0ODY3OS84MjQwNTY1LmpwZw==/original/MJLCKQ.jpg]]

More titles will be added BEFORE they're released individually! Additionally, this bundle will also include special additional goodies that you can't get elsewhere! It's the ultimate experience for the CC &amp; SH fan.</p>
