<p><strong></strong><br></p>
<p><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTQ1NjY3LzM2MTMxNDIucG5n/original/oFaiWa.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTQ1NjY3LzM2MTMxNjAucG5n/original/An4zM0.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTQ1NjY3LzM2MTMxNzgucG5n/original/Al6Jj%2B.png]]






<p><em>Chasing the Ace</em> is a GMless, card-based storytelling game of mecha drama. In it, players take on the role of a mecha squadron lead by the legendary Ace. The Ace has led your squadron out of deadly situations more times than you can count. Together you've saved thousands of lives over the course of the war you find yourselves in. But the Ace has confided in you a secret: at midnight tonight, they are going to steal their mecha. They have not told you why, but they have asked you to join them. With you, they say, they stand a chance. You have until midnight to decide.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Failure risks execution for treason. But do you even want to help them?</p>
<p><em>Chasing the Ace</em> is a Descended From the Queen&nbsp;game for 3-5 players. To play it, you just need a deck of regular playing cards and this book. It is a game of interpersonal drama set amidst a war between a paramilitary organization, its mecha pilots, and monstrous beings that threaten the world. Together, you will define the war, the Ace, and your characters over the course of play, until you are finally faced with your decision.&nbsp;Each session takes around an hour to play.&nbsp;<br></p>
<p>Check out the demo file below, which lays out the full rules and setting premise.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTI2MzgwLzcxOTk5MjQucG5n/original/sab7fj.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTI2MzgwLzcxOTk5MjUucG5n/original/oDxNek.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTI2MzgwLzcxOTk5MjcucG5n/original/E5%2BRdI.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTI2MzgwLzcxOTk5MjgucG5n/original/ofpYqq.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNTI2MzgwLzcxOTk5MjYucG5n/original/Cn3Com.png]]






<p><strong>Death isn‚Äôt the end, it‚Äôs just the beginning for this family.</strong></p>
<p>Blood is thicker than water, and as a member of a Chinese family, you are constantly reminded of your duty. Increase the face and fortunes of your family, all the while experiencing strange occurrences and life events that shape who you are.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</p>
<p>Chinese Ghost Stories We Tell Ourselves is a communal horror tabletop roleplaying game based on Chinese ghost stories and cultural interpretations. Find out what ghost story you will weave with your family. Can you avoid inviting ghosts into this world and can you confront your own inner demons?&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>This game is GM-less, uses a d100 system and is for 3-4 players. Please use safety tools for this horror game- they can be accessed here&nbsp;<a href="http://bit.ly/ttrpgsafetytoolkit" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">TTRPG Safety Toolkit</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>This is the Quickstart version of this game for #BIPOCVampJam! You do not have to be Chinese to play this game, but the design intentions behind this game was for the Chinese diaspora, also welcoming BIPOC, that found familiarity in the themes and experiences.&nbsp;&nbsp;Stay tuned for a fully released game!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzY5NDcyOTMucG5n/original/vExNj5.png]]






<p>This is supplementary content for the fifth edition of the&nbsp;world's most popular roleplaying game, ready to be added to your campaigns.</p>
<p>Created in celebration of Pride 2020, the Chromatic Sorcerer allows you to carve your own magical identity from the weave, changing the damage type of spells and granting you powerful boons based on your choices.</p>
<p>Supplements produced by Monarch Arts range from classes,&nbsp;monsters, items, mechanics&nbsp;and everything in-between. Each supplement is individually priced so you can hand pick the content that suits your game and setting.</p><p>You can also check out the Monarch Arts Discord&nbsp;<a href="https://discord.gg/X44KGNY" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgzODU4MDMucG5n/original/JZYNVu.png]]






<p>At the top of the Tower lives the Witch. They have knowledge, power, wealth, beauty, and respect... and that's exactly what YOU want. Join a company of companions, each seeking something different from the Witch, each convinced that they're the one who will safely navigate the Tower as others fall by the wayside. Each of you has your own relationship with the Witch, and will be compelled by their Tower in unique ways.</p>
<p><strong>Climbing the Witch‚Äôs Tower</strong> is heavily inspired by fairy tales like Kate Crackernuts, musicals like Into the Woods, and games like Bluebeard‚Äôs Bride. It is rife with tarot imagery and a dark fairytale aesthetic.</p>
<p>The Witch is Waiting.</p>
<p>---</p>
<p>If you are interested in playing this game online, we have a custom character keeper <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MWOw5yk_fXRnRpfrlUa-YIiSmnKfW74AqcoGZnIM-hU/edit?usp=sharing" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>. Please make a copy before editing for that session's players.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzNjAucG5n/original/t%2BywfG.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzMDQucG5n/original/dKDOMR.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzMTkucG5n/original/dkbTdJ.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzMjYucG5n/original/F4X6lK.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzMzgucG5n/original/xINuot.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzNDcucG5n/original/lbjmyr.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM1MzM5LzQwOTIzNTUucG5n/original/BxjSik.png]]






<p><em>Thinking of the final pleas of his dearest friend, the metal man holds out a gleaming purple crystal, gazing expectantly at the wooden heap. Thinking of her family‚Äôs pox-ridden faces, the child lifts her gnarled wooden wand, an identical copy of the one her grandparent had once wielded. Thinking of the lord who took everything from her, the brunette raises her crimson dagger to the heavens. Three words are said, and the inert wood instantly bursts into fiery life, an inferno of brilliant blue lapping against the robes of the assembled coven. The First Deal has been made.</em><span></span><br></p>
<p><em></em>Come With A Price is a rules light tabletop roleplaying game, in which you and your friends join together to craft the story of a coven of witches setting out to make their wildest dreams come true. Together, these witches harness nearly unlimited magical power in order to accomplish feats beyond mortal understanding. Magic demands sacrifice, however, and sometimes deals must be struck so that a witch can get what they want. Making bargains, doing the impossible, and reshaping the world: that is the life of a witch.</p>
<p>Come With A Price was created for&nbsp;<a href="https://itch.io/jam/witch-jam">Witch Jam</a></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM2MzgzLzQwOTkyOTkucG5n/original/rpjkWq.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM2MzgzLzQ0ODUyNDQucG5n/original/TtvQtb.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzM2MzgzLzQwOTkyNDEucG5n/original/%2FCpBKr.png]]






<p><strong>News</strong>: This page is for the PDF version.&nbsp;You can also purchase our&nbsp;<a href="https://www.lulu.com/en/us/shop/asa-olson-and-alex-johnson/backwater-southern-gothic-horror-tabletop-roleplaying/hardcover/product-e22yzj.html?page=1&amp;pageSize=4" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Core Rulebook hardcover</a>&nbsp;on Lulu!</p>
<h2>Core Rulebook</h2>
<p>The&nbsp;<em>Backwater</em>&nbsp;core rulebook is approximately 220 pages and includes character creation rules, rules for the D20 game system, setting information for players, setting information for GMs, and NPC/monster stats. It also includes four pre-generated character sheets and a blank character sheet.</p>
<h2>Long after The End descended upon the Old World...</h2>
<p>Humanity started to rebuild itself, albeit wretched and forlorn. Survivors salvaged what they could of government in the form of the American Lands. They rebuilt roads, though in fewer numbers and inferior quality, and they reclaimed the skeletons of buildings. Nowhere does humankind rebuild so desperately as in the humid swamps of the Backwater, where humanity battles itself and the natural elements to survive. You are a warden here‚Äîa roaming peace keeper in the American Lands‚Äîprotecting order at civilization‚Äôs southern reach. You travel the Old World‚Äôs crumbling roadways among mosquitoes and snakes. You tend to every small town‚Äôs big secret, and you quell strife between old families in a new era. Here in the bogs, you keep mutation at bay, ever-watchful for the wretched cousins of ancient humanity. You protect mankind from supernatural horrors that have only started to emerge.
</p>
<p><strong>Welcome to Backwater...&nbsp;</strong><strong>where horror writes itself.</strong>
</p>
<h2>Backwater: Southern Gothic Horror Tabletop Roleplaying</h2>
<p>Backwater is a tabletop roleplaying game in the genre of southern gothic horror. The southern gothic genre explores social issues relating to fear, poverty, religion, and alienation through its southern U.S. setting. Prominent among the genre's themes is a conscious criticism of superficial values and regional or familial history, depicted through the region's decaying structures and aristocratic families. It contains the supernatural, though the true horrors are often humans themselves. Backwater is set in a post-apocalyptic future with a tenuous social order, and it reimagines the genre as a reflection on issues in not only American history but also our present world.&nbsp;
</p>
<h3>Streamlined Stats</h3>
<p>The&nbsp;<em>Backwater</em>&nbsp;game system is original. It uses a 20-sided die for everything except combat damage. It is intended to be relatively intuitive and streamlined. The foundation of this system is a set of four basic attributes that provide both a modifier (which you add to rolls) and a goal score (which others roll against). When you attempt a skill roll against another character, you simply roll against one of their attribute goals, for example:
</p>
<ul><li>When you threaten or deceive a character, you roll against its Intuition goal.
</li><li>When you hide from or sneak by a character, you roll against its Vigilance goal.
</li><li>When you attack a character, you roll against its Reflex goal.
</li><li>When you shove or trip a character, you roll against its Build goal.
</li></ul>
<h3>Unique Survival Elements</h3>
<p>Characters have both Health Points (physical health) and Resolve Points (mental health), but they are relatively low to reflect human fragility. Combat scenarios can move quickly as a result, and they often require careful strategizing to mitigate damage or defeat threats rapidly. One especially unique element of the system is its Health rolls and Resolve rolls. Players must try to roll under their current Health or Resolve with a d20 to avoid suffering a condition, like the Bleeding condition. The more damage or duress that a character receives, the more likely it may suffer the condition.</p>
<h2>What are people saying about our game?</h2>
<p><a href="https://ko-fi.com/Post/TTRPG-Review-Backwater-by-Backwater-Games-K3K4A9VB3" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Wendigo Workshop</a>'s review says that the Backwater TTRPG is "quite easy to pick up, and the character creation tutorial is simple to follow, making it easy to make new characters for the first time. [...]&nbsp;<em>Backwater&nbsp;</em>is a very good game, and a nice addition to fans of the horror genre."
</p>
<p>Some comments from our customers:
</p>
<ul><li>"I love the books, the system and the setting! [...] I love the lore and would love to see it expand to see how different territories have dealt with things and to see what creatures rise from them"</li><li>"This setting made me overjoyed as someone who really wants to see more stuff from the rich and vibrant culture of this part of the country, as my friends who I've strongarmed into playing this with me can attest."</li><li>"Really great system! I've been running a campaign for a few friends and I also am really keen on the rest of the universe in this system"</li></ul>
<h2>What else do we have?</h2>
<p>Check out some of our other items on itch:
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://backwater-games.itch.io/shiver">shivers: a d20 rules-lite system (PDF, Free)</a></li><li><a href="https://backwater-games.itch.io/quickstart" target="_blank">Backwater Quickstart Guide (Free&nbsp;PDF)</a>
</li><li><a href="https://backwater-games.itch.io/prince-of-darkness" target="_blank">Backwater Adventures:&nbsp;The Prince of Darkness is a Gentleman (PDF)</a><span></span><ul><li><a href="https://backwater-games.itch.io/solitaire-eulalie">Eulalie's Curse: A Backwater Solitaire (PDF)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p>Or purchase our <a href="https://www.lulu.com/en/us/shop/asa-olson-and-alex-johnson/backwater-southern-gothic-horror-tabletop-roleplaying/hardcover/product-e22yzj.html?page=1&amp;pageSize=4" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Core Rulebook hardcover</a> through Lulu.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwMzY1NS83NDA3MDUxLnBuZw==/original/bqVUBH.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwMzY1NS83NDA3MDUzLnBuZw==/original/fru84b.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwMzY1NS83NDA3MDU3LnBuZw==/original/htCKqw.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwMzY1NS84MTUwNjk4LmpwZw==/original/s4n7if.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwMzY1NS84MTUwNjk3LmpwZw==/original/Ez4JdF.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwMzY1NS84MTUwNjk5LmpwZw==/original/OcWf%2FG.jpg]]






<h3>Welcome to the Wasteland</h3>
<p></p>
<p>Courier is a solo-RPG where you take control of a Courier‚Äîsomeone who travels the Wasteland delivering and trading cargo in exchange for REP, the currency of this post-apocalyptic future. As you explore the world around you, locations and factions are revealed and recorded on your map. Choose to take jobs for factions and build reputation to access new benefits all while becoming better at your job and earning new character perks.
</p>
<p>You will continue to take on quests delivering, recovering, or scouting the map for one of the many factions populating the Wasteland. Every choice you make as a Courier will reflect how these factions view you and open new opportunities and bonuses as your standing increases, or decreases through a fame and infamy system. Choices will have you siding with a few select factions by the end of your game and seeing the world change for it.
</p>
<p>Factions are not the only interactions. Companions can be found at many locations in the world and will adventure with you into the Wasteland. All companions are randomly generated by you and can grow into someone unique, using the perks system provided. These bonuses will help keep you safe and moving forward towards your ultimate goal, becoming a Legendary Wasteland Courier.
</p>
<p>You will equip protective equipment, cargo rigs, exploration tools, and weapons, if you hope to stand a chance at surviving everything the Wasteland has to throw at you. All of your equipment can be upgraded over time to suit your needs and provide better bonuses. Unique and rare trinkets can be found in your travels, gaining even more passive boosts to your character.
</p>
<p>This is just the start of what Courier has to offer, so jump into your journey as a new Courier in the Wasteland!
</p>
<p></p>
<p class="text-center">&nbsp;<strong>Additional content will be released to this page as it is completed and becomes available!</strong></p>
<h4>Playlist for Courier</h4>
<h4><iframe src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/playlist/6vYDqfyTEvCwGFp3PfvvcY" width="100%" height="380" frameborder="0"></iframe></h4>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1Njc1OS82NzMyNTQ4LnBuZw==/original/%2FNdprM.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1Njc1OS82NzMyNTg3LmpwZw==/original/bk3rpj.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1Njc1OS82NzMyNTk0LmpwZw==/original/5DRykD.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1Njc1OS82NzMyNTk2LmpwZw==/original/6ku8ws.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE1Njc1OS82NzMyNTk4LnBuZw==/original/YW7jh2.png]]






<p><em>Dedicated to Wyatt, Rowan, Moor, and Eric.</em></p>
<p>A game for 2-6 powered by Avery Alder's Belonging Outside Belonging.<em><br><br></em><strong><em>CRISIS</em></strong> is a superhero RPG about saving the world and how it breaks them.&nbsp; You play a group of heroes teaming up to stop what is coming for your homes. All the while you must grapple with what doing this job has cost you and how long you can keep this going.<br></p>
<p>The game is meant to grapple with the duality of being a hero. The struggle between civilian and heroic identities and what success in one has cost the other. When the clock strikes midnight and the crisis arrives, what are the things truly worth saving?<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzU3NTA1LzUxMjU1NDgucG5n/original/XPRrx8.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzU3NTA1LzUxMjU1MzcuanBn/original/%2Bj8RJq.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzU3NTA1LzUxMjU1MzguanBn/original/7HuV43.jpg]]






<h1><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzcyNDY4NjAucG5n/original/sIMGr0.png" style="font-size: 24px" loading="lazy"></h1>
<h3><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzcyNjA4MzYucG5n/original/FpwyDN.png" loading="lazy"></h3>
<h3>CRUST is an amalgamation of dozens of our favorite genres of media, and a gentle jab at my own past life, and friends, who've lived as gutterpunks.&nbsp;</h3>
<p>At the core, this game is anti-capitalist propaganda, and in the final product there will be plenty of places for the reader to discover that. But this game is also much more.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Live as a crustie on a hostile planet call M-0847.&nbsp;Owned and operated by the CORPOS, 3 major conglomerative corporations that are mining for ASTEL. ASTEL is a rare mineral that only forms on M-0847, and is used as a zero-emission fuel for the booming space-trade industry.</p>
<p>ASTEL is also deadly to mine, and incredibly volatile in its raw state. Naturally, the contracts the laborers from earth signed give them no choice in the matter, and they've all been shipped to the planet to dig out the rock.<br></p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzcyNDcxNzMucG5n/original/4Tm%2FOR.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p>ASTEL's volatile nature also causes wild, and horrific mutations in the beings that come in contact with it for too long. Over long, or short periods these mutations distort the creature, turning them into horrific monstrosities. These monsters are called NIGHTMARES, and will never be the same twice. Each time players encounter a NIGHTMARE, it will be randomly pieced together from a series of tables.</p>
<p>Aside from NIGHTMARES, other giant beasts similar to Earths, can be found wandering the four biomes of M-0847. And come in contact with them you will.</p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzcyNDY4OTMucG5n/original/jQMsYO.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p>So what are you waiting for grab your bat, dig through the trash for some rations and a barbed wire, and hit the road. Regardless of how anti-corp you might be, you have to do work to survive here. And once you're here, there's no going back.</p>
<h3><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzcyNDY4NjQucG5n/original/Wrf6vN.png" style="" loading="lazy"></h3>
<p>The Final release of CRUST will be significantly larger. Here's a list of just SOME of the things we plan to include, but be prepared for even more.</p>
<ul><li>Dozens of new weapons and tools, including a large variety of custom firearms unique to this game</li><li>Fully customizable progression system</li><li>A much larger selection of combat actions</li><li>Camping and Traveling Mechanics</li><li>Vehicles and upgrades</li><li>Many more options for the NIGHTMARES</li><li>More downtime activities including gambling, and tattooing</li><li>Dozens of loot tables, including rare collectible zines and cassettes, and comics.</li><li>Dozens of tables to generate full dungeons on the fly, for the three exclusive dungeon types: Labs, Digsites, and Hives</li><li>d100 random encounter table</li><li>Town generation tables</li><li>Weather tables</li><li>And much much more!</li></ul>
<h3></h3>
<h5>Thank you so much for joining us on this journey, and we look forward to hearing your comments and critiques, as well as your feedback on playtests!<br><br><br><br>Join our discord and ask for help with any confusion, or questions!     <a href="https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A</a></h5>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI0MTA2Ny83OTgwMDgxLnBuZw==/original/fJrMu5.png]]






<h1>CRUST Launches in June&nbsp;on Gamefound</h1>
<h2>Give us your email address so we can get in contact with you as soon as the page is live!&nbsp;</h2>
<h2><a href="https://bit.ly/CRUSTalert" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://bit.ly/CRUSTalert</a></h2>
<div><br></div>
<p><strong></strong><strong><em>It‚Äôs 1993 and you‚Äôre landlocked on M-0847, a distant planet rife with resources the CORPOS use to perpetuate their booming space trade.</em></strong></p>
<p>You‚Äôre dirty gutter punks scrounging to survive in a place you don‚Äôt know well.
</p>
<p>There‚Äôs a wild world outside filled with deadly animals, weird weather, and cops.&nbsp;
</p>
<p>Worse yet are the abominations mutated from the depths of the planet that long to pull you into their gaping maws.
</p>
<p>Strap in, you‚Äôre here for the long haul.&nbsp;
</p>
<p>Find some food in a dumpster, and grift your way into a bed at the nearest hostel where at least you‚Äôll <em>feel </em>safe.
</p>
<h2>What is CRUST?
</h2>
<h4>CRUST is a brand new sci-fi horror game inspired by OSR game ethos. It draws inspiration and elements Year Zero, Mork Borg, and the Black Hack. Players are able to&nbsp;fully customize a character in any way they imagine, through a variety of&nbsp;unique talents, weapons, and rare items.</h4>
<h4>CRUST employs a simple, modified dice pool system.&nbsp;Shoot for 6's or modify your rolls with a variety of abilities to increase your success chance.&nbsp;</h4>
<h2>It‚Äôs coming to the Gamefound Crowdfunding platform in June!</h2>
<p>CRUST is being published by Disaster Tourism.
<strong>CRUST will Feature:</strong>
</p>
<ul><li>3-4 full color zine booklets&nbsp;
</li><li>Concise and simple ruleset and super fast character creation.&nbsp;
</li><li>Dozens of world building tables, generators, loot tables and more.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</li><li>Dungeon generation tables for each of the three dungeon types, for fully randomized and fast encounter creation
</li><li>A full progression system with 40 talents, 12 mutations, and a variety of ways to gain experience.
</li><li>Professional editing by Jarrett Crader of MRC.
</li><li>D-beat cassette by the canonical band <em>Tourist</em> recorded by Sean Martin of The Aurora Sound
</li><li>A mini adventure designed by Copper State Games and Duvelman Dice included in the <em>Tourist </em>tape J-card.
</li><li>Custom Molotov dice&nbsp;by Duvelman Dice
</li><li>Patches and Stickers by Kristen Denner
</li><li>and more!
</li></ul>
<h2>Check out some of the concept art we've got going right now!</h2>
<p><strong>Gutterpunk Guns</strong></p>
<h3><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgxMTAzOTcucG5n/original/HJbDaE.png" loading="lazy"></h3>
<h3></h3>

<p>
You can find our games at <a href="https://disastertourism.itch.io/">Disaster Tourism</a>.
</p>

<h2>Team Members:</h2>

</p>

</p>

<p><br></p>
<h4>From Kirby:</h4>
<p>
This game began as a joke between Kristen and me a year and a half ago. We were throwing out ideas for weird and wacky game concepts, and she shouted ‚ÄúCRUST PUNKS IN SPACE!‚Äù and the concept just spiraled. It‚Äôs been through many iterations, but as I‚Äôve grown my library, and gotten deeper into the OSR and other unique game systems it‚Äôs slowly grown to reflect that. The system, and setting of CRUST are one that I‚Äôve labored over far more than I should have, but one of which I‚Äôm immensely proud. Kristen‚Äôs artwork is phenomenal, and reflects exactly what I had hoped in every aspect. Without her input from day one this game would have ended in a shredder. I hope you find hours (or months) of excitement and fun with this system. I know I have! &nbsp;
</p>
<p><strong><br></strong></p>
