<p><br></p>
<p>Become the <strong>Lich</strong>, cast off your earthly bonds and ascend beyond mortality!</p>
<p>With this Pathfinder Second Edition supplement, you can attain lichdom through a dedication feat archetype! Shape your lich abilities with subsequent feats! Paralyze, freeze, or even feed on the souls of your foes.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Fear not, however, because not every lich is evil and you may find ways to save your soul from the stain of evil, yet gain the power and longevity you so desire!</p>
<p>With 12 feats total, your lich can stand out among the rest!&nbsp;</p>
<p>B<span style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit">ase dedication feat also includes a new ritual!</span></p>
<p>The archetype begins at level 10 and can be taken in tandem with any spellcaster who can cast 5th level soells or higher.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Author: Shawn Pommier&nbsp;(<a href="https://twitter.com/EldritchDream" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">@EldritchDream</a>)</p>
<p>Artwork: <a href="https://josephseraph.itch.io/">Joseph Seraph</a>, <a href="https://galefirerpg.itch.io/">GalefireRPG</a></p><p>Check out more on our main page!&nbsp;<a href="https://eldritchdream.itch.io/">https://eldritchdream.itch.io/</a><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA2OTQuanBn/original/KX6VoG.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA2OTYuanBn/original/z0cKqR.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA2OTcuanBn/original/Tm7h5N.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA2OTguanBn/original/%2F%2FOgig.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA3MDAuanBn/original/CWrwi5.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA3MDEuanBn/original/uAILK7.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA3MDQuanBn/original/Lt5LN9.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzEwMDU5LzgyNTA3MDYuanBn/original/q4VjYJ.jpg]]






<p>Bring the heat with this SPICY new heritage for the fleshy ancestry, with two accompanying feats!</p>
<p>Burn your enemies with spicy chemicals, throw bursting peppers, and harness your temper to bring the pain!!!</p>
<p><em>Artists:</em></p>
<p><em>Shawn Pommier [Author] [<a href="https://twitter.com/EldritchDream" title="Https://twitter.com/eldritchdream" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://twitter.com/EldritchDream</a>]</em></p>
<p>images in public domain</p><p>Check out more on our main page!&nbsp;<a href="https://eldritchdream.itch.io/">https://eldritchdream.itch.io/</a><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzM4MTkxMDQuanBn/original/0TKmHM.jpg]]






<p>Undeath can come for anyone... EVEN YOU!</p>
<p>This new universal heritage for the Pathfinder Second Edition system allows you to become an undead, with two options on how to play: A safer more-standard-heritage version, and a sudden death true-undead version. Check out these features!</p>
<ul><li>New heritage for any corporeal ancestry</li><li>Lore</li><li>Necrid Hardcore: a sudden death true-to-undead optional variant</li><li>8 level 1 ancestry feats (4 obsolete for Necrid Hardcore)</li><li>4 level 5 ancestry feats&nbsp;</li><li>3 level 9 ancestry feats</li><li>2 level 13 ancestry feats</li><li>A new Alchemical formula: Elixir of Undeath at levels: 1, 5, 9, 13, 15, and 19</li></ul>
<p>Technical data: Pages 4 (1 cover, 2.5 content, .5 credit, legal, and visual key)</p>
<p>Artists:</p>
<p>Shawn Pommier [Author, Coverart] [<a href="https://twitter.com/EldritchDream" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://twitter.com/EldritchDream</a>]
Image components part of public domain.</p><p>Check out more on our main page!&nbsp;<a href="https://eldritchdream.itch.io/">https://eldritchdream.itch.io/</a><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNjkxNjYwLzUwMjQ3NzkuanBlZw==/original/JtHp%2F5.jpeg]]






<p><em>Elf Genders </em>is a worldbuilding tool for creating your own new systems of fantasy genders. Most humans are women, men, or nonbinary, but maybe elves are‚Ä¶ something else? <em>Elf Genders </em>helps you decide what!<br></p>
<p>Elves are the example culture, but you can use these techniques to create a new system of genders for Dragons, Orcs, Fae, Werewolves, or any other fantasy creatures.
</p>
<p>Want to brighten up your fantasy RPGs with vivid, complex gender options? Generate these setting and lore details before you start a campaign or one-shot of any fantasy tabletop RPG, from Dungeons &amp; Dragons to the latest indie games.<span class="">&nbsp;</span>
</p>
<p><strong>You Will Need:</strong></p>
<p>* Any number of players, including 1.<span class="">&nbsp;</span>
</p>
<p>* A set of polyhedral dice (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20) or online dice roller.<span class="">&nbsp;</span>
</p>
<p>* For multi-player sessions: a method for shared note-taking, such as Google Docs (if playing online) or a designated scribe (if playing in person).
</p>
<p><strong>Credits:</strong><br></p>
<p>Lucian Kahn ‚Äì writing &amp; game design</p>
<p>Jabari Weathers&nbsp;‚Äì cover illustration</p>
<p>Nathan D. Paoletta&nbsp;‚Äì layout</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTAyNjk0MC81ODU3MzkwLmpwZw==/original/Sw8q5O.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTAyNjk0MC81ODU3MzkyLmpwZw==/original/YePD9K.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTAyNjk0MC81ODU3Mzk0LmpwZw==/original/cpAMIv.jpg]]






<p>A TTRPG where you steal boats for Elvis, inspired by Mojo Nixon's song, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mpb4ZAAP6Z4" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">"Elvis is Everywhere"</a>&nbsp; with mechanics based on <a href="https://natetreme.itch.io/tunnelgoons">Tunnel Goons</a><br></p>
<p>You use your three stats, Sailing, Stealing, and Elvis, to steal boats for The King, and take them to the very center of the Bermuda Triangle.</p><p><br></p><p>I made this because the idea got stuck in my head one night, after my daughter got briefly obsessed with the song, Elvis is Everywhere. Now I have made it and released myself from the spell it holds over me.<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzYwOTIzNDAucG5n/original/9Xo8Ne.png]]






<p><em></em><em>Some days go so well that they seem almost magical. Other days can be a struggle just to get through. On those days, maybe a bit of enchantment in the form of tea or another hot drink can help.</em></p>
<p>Enchanted Blends can be a journaling game or thought exercise, whatever best makes your day magical. All you need are these instructions, your favorite hot drink, and maybe 2 six-sided dice and something to write with and on, depending on how you want to use this. Create the enchanted blend you need and use it throughout your day, or create a new blend every time you need something different.</p>
<p>Just remember&nbsp;that the real magic is inside of you. This is a visualization technique simply meant to make it easier for you to tap into your own inner abilities.</p>
<p><br><em>Inspired by <a href="https://bethmakesgames.itch.io/everyday-enchanter" target="_blank">Everyday Enchanter</a> by&nbsp;‚ú®Beth Jackson. It's an incredible and inspiring game that I&nbsp;cannot recommend enough &lt;3</em></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNDg5MC84MzE3OTAyLnBuZw==/original/ZVgqvF.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNDg5MC84MjUzNjM3LnBuZw==/original/cb2zh%2F.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNDg5MC84MjUzNjM4LnBuZw==/original/ngxU%2Fy.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNDg5MC84MjUzNjM5LnBuZw==/original/ANmgBf.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNDg5MC84MjUzNjQwLnBuZw==/original/yskHk2.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxNDg5MC84MjUzNjQyLnBuZw==/original/doQQCw.png]]






<p><strong>Epic Buddies</strong>&nbsp;is a&nbsp;<strong>Fiction-First&nbsp;</strong>tabletop roleplaying game system.<br></p>
<p>Below is an in-depth description of the game to give you an idea of what it's about, or you can <a href="https://epicbuddiesgame.mysellful.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">visit our website</a>&nbsp;<a href="https://epicbuddiesgame.mysellful.com/#home-header" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">epicbuddiesgame.com</a>&nbsp;for all the info you need and a browser-viewable version of the rules.</p>
<p>What does this mean? It means that the person running the game is a&nbsp;<strong>Storyteller</strong>, they are in charge of crafting a narrative that is compelling and fun to play. Traditionally time-consuming mechanics (calculations&nbsp;and such) are reduced in favour of spinning a good yarn. Our system is built to accommodate flexibility, and to prevent the flow of a story getting bogged down by number crunching and constant referencing.
</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Players: 1 Storyteller and 1+ Players.<br></p>
<p>Required:&nbsp;Writing gear and a D6 (six-sided die). If you have no die, ask a search engine or digital assistant to "Roll a dice".<br></p>
<p>Epic Buddies is made for anyone to experience any type of story; from first-time roleplayers, to experienced dungeoneers and everything in-between. The Epic Buddies system can be used to tell the kinds of stories you enjoy, be it homebrew, adapted from the campaign books of other tabletop games, or even lifted from your favourite novel, movie, TV show, or video game.&nbsp;
</p>
<p>With many great tabletop game systems out there, it can be time-consuming to learn, or to teach newcomers complicated rulesets. Epic Buddies is pick-up-and-play: It‚Äôs quick to learn, easy to take with you, and can be as in-depth or as simple as you like.&nbsp;
</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>The two page Quick Rules can be printed on a single sheet of A4 back to back (duplex).<br>If you want to provide new players fewer rules, they can be given the Player Page instead of the Quick Rules (as long as the Storyteller knows the Quick Rules).</p>
<p>Print out a copy of the Character Sheet for each player.&nbsp;</p>
<p>We have a full gamebook in the works that provides much more detail, FAQs, tips, suggestions, and nice artwork (this will be available as soon as we‚Äôve closed the public beta playtesting, and have given it one last layer of polish). Until this is available, these Quick Rules can get you&nbsp;started and we humbly ask for any amount you wish to donate to support the development of Epic Buddies!</p>
<p>We are playing the game ourselves, and have plenty of sessions recorded to share our tales with the world, and we would love to hear what adventures you undertake. If you have recorded sessions and want to share them, send us some links to add to our&nbsp;<a href="https://epicbuddiesgame.mysellful.com/campaigns/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Campaigns</a>&nbsp;page. If you have any feedback or questions, please drop us a line via our&nbsp;<a href="https://epicbuddiesgame.mysellful.com/contact" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Contact</a>&nbsp;page.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Step 1 -&nbsp;Choose your Talents and assign each one with a unique Aptitude. Create 3 Epic Skills just for you.</p>
<p>Step 2 -&nbsp;When asked by the Storyteller, roll the Talent for the Action you are attempting.</p>
<p>Step 3 -&nbsp;Buddy system! Ask a Buddy to roll if your roll Failed so that they can help out!</p>
<p>Step 4 -&nbsp;Benefit from being Trained, and experience extra losses or gains with Epic Roll results.<br></p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Thank you for your support, we hope you have many wonderful adventures! Please remember to&nbsp;<a href="https://epicbuddiesgame.mysellful.com/contact" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Contact</a>&nbsp;us to let us know what you think and the adventures you have undertaken with our ruleset.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzU5MDU1NzgucG5n/original/ABRRPv.png]]






<p>A GM-less, solo or collaborative, choose your own adventure style cyberpunk TTRPG set in Neo-Millennia.<span class="">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span class=""></span>
</p>
<p><span class="">Welcome! This is a rough, ROUGH prototype for Escape from Neo-Millenia. Please expect a more updated version in which the story evolves and ideas grow. It‚Äôs not perfect. This is just a demo of the mechanisms and a chance to put some game design out into the universe within 48 hours for the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/cyberpunk-by-asian-creators-game-jam">Cyberpunk by Asian Creators Jam!</a></span></p>
<p><span class="">I also have incorporated <a href="https://www.storytellingcollective.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"><span class="">Storytelling Collective‚Äôs</span></a> Flash February Fiction Challenge in this version, in which 28 prompts were provided everyday in February to incite creativity and writing. Flash Fiction is usually less than 1,500 words a day. 500 words is actually pretty good. This document has closer to 5,000 words. I just flash forwarded those 28 days into this project. Look for the following prompts in any of the sections: Space. Time. Heart. Sky. Challenge. Oath. Inspiration. Weapon. Food. Creature. Music. Old. New. City. Desert. Mountain. Mood. Colour. Senses. Future. Peace. War. Travel. Home. Belief. Magic. Lost. Found.</span></p>
<p><span class="">Please keep safe during this game. Your wellbeing matters more than this game!<span class="">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p><span class="">Find them here:<span class="">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p><span class=""></span>
</p>
<p><span class=""><a href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/114jRmhzBpdqkAlhmveis0nmW73qkAZCj" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">TTRPG Safety Toolkit </a></span><span class="">by Kienna Shaw (@KiennaS) and Lauren Bryant-Monk (@jl_nicegirl)</span></p>
<p><span class=""><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1T-4diHGaxlOy-N76rYmqYvLXkSV-dp_L3lSMZvb8Qqg/edit" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Support Tools Compilation</a></span><span class=""> by Natalie (@rpgnatalie)<span class="">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p>I appreciate all feedback that can be provided :) I loved CYOA books, especially Fighting Fantasy, as a child. This combines my love for TTRPGs and interactive fiction!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzUzMjIxMzAuanBlZw==/original/LsYlBO.jpeg]]






<p>This game was created for the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/gender-game-jam">Gender Jam</a>.</p>
<p>Hi! I‚Äôm a trans non-binary creator who constantly tries to reverse-engineer their gender identity by clumping together all the characters that give me gender envy and then staring at them for a very long time like it‚Äôs some sort of identity crisis bingo sheet. Personally my gender seems to be ‚Äúhot anime characters that are often mistaken for beautiful women but identify canonically as cis men‚Äù&nbsp;
</p>
<p>Basically, I'd like to take all the confusion my ethnicity generates and channel that into my gender presentation.&nbsp;
</p>
<p>And from that ‚ÄúEuphoria‚Äù was born. This game is a light-hearted celebration and meant to be a fun way to explore your feelings about gender with someone you trust to celebrate with you. That said, exploring gender can lead to unexpected emotions.&nbsp;
</p>
<p>So be sure to only play it in safe spaces you feel comfortable in and with someone you trust to explore and celebrate with you and have some self care items in place if you feel you might need them.</p>
<p>This was also a wonderful opportunity to workshop mechanics for a Bingo/Battleship style game since I am currently working on a game in that style with&nbsp;<a href="https://pukepeku.itch.io/">Mitzi Tuquiero</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIxOTcxNS83MTE1MTY4LmpwZw==/original/2Uv7xY.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIxOTcxNS83MTE1MTY3LmpwZw==/original/f%2FIP9J.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIxOTcxNS83MTE1MTYxLnBuZw==/original/cGIS28.png]]






<p><strong>Evergreen Wilds: Physical brochures available at&nbsp;Exalted Funeral</strong><br></p>
<p>Life can be hectic, chaotic, and busy. Every now and again we just need a little break from the norm. Evergreen Wilds has a prime opportunity for you! Take a season away from your home life and spend it as a ranger here in our national park! We'll put you through a few weeks of training before dropping you off for an 8 week rotation. As you respond to calls from Ranger HQ to investigate and document incidents, you'll be keeping hikers and campers safe, and maintaining the security and beauty of the Wilds.&nbsp;
</p>
<p><strong>What is Evergreen Wilds?</strong>
Evergreen Wilds is a solo roleplaying game that allows a player to live and explore a season as a park ranger in a national park. Evergreen Wilds uses a simple journaling system, with keyword, and weather prompts, and map locations to create unique encounters throughout each week the player is stationed.&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;
<strong>Evergreen Wilds Features:</strong>
</p>
<ul><li>A concise stylized brochure with all rules, and information needed to play within.
</li><li>A full park map, with locations, keywords, and weather prompts.
</li></ul>
<p><strong>Social Media Links</strong>
You can find us here on <a href="http://twitter.com/dtrpgs" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Twitter</a> 
You can find our games at <a href="https://disastertourism.itch.io/">Disaster Tourism</a>.
</p>
<p><strong>Team Members&nbsp;</strong>
</p>

</p>

<p><a href="https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A</a>
</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM2NzQyNS83OTk4Mjg0LnBuZw==/original/N6bTIi.png]]






<p><strong>Every&nbsp;Wizard Has a Hat</strong> is a very rules-light, role playing game with minimalistic rules focused on free form magic wizards and player &amp; GM interactions.</p>
<p>The book is not well designed but the system is there and I like it so I'll post it here, It took a while to make so I'll leave it as 1 Dollar for now but feel free to grab a community copy (I'll add more in time or if people like this shit!). Questions can be made and I may improve some of the writting or whatever in it if I feel like its needed, perhaps its too complicated? Idk</p>
<ul><li>The PDF is the rules book.</li><li>The Sheets Guide are the images explaining how to make the sheets (Character, Spell and Cabal)</li><li>The Sheets Examples are an example playable character I made to more in-depth explain this shit. (Recommended to look at)</li><li>HATS CAN BE ANYTHING.</li></ul>
<p>Have fun!&nbsp;I love you.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTExNDI4OS83OTM5OTYxLnBuZw==/original/js6udv.png]]






<p>We all face all sorts of struggles in our lives, but what if we could lean on a little bit of hidden magic to help us through it?</p>
<p><em><strong>Everyday Enchanter</strong></em> is here to help! Enchant your glasses with VIBRANCY to allow you to feel wide awake when you put them on, give your favorite shirt RESILIENCE to make physical and mental pain feel more manageable, and when things really get bad, snuggle up to your favorite GROUNDED-enchanted stuffed animal to regain a feeling of&nbsp;safety and control.<br></p>
<p>To make the enchantments stronger, simply focus on them in times of need! Reminding yourself that you've got help, even if it's just your favorite pen in your pocket, can help make the tough times a bit more bearable or give you that extra boost of confidence to try something new! And if you really want to strengthen the enchantments, journal about your experiences. When you write about how you really wanted to buy that candy bar at the grocery store checkout but clutched your STAND FIRM-enchanted keychain and resisted temptation, you'll embed that power deeper into your mind. One day you won't even need the enchantments anymore...but until then, they're here for you!</p>
<p>Just remember that there's no&nbsp;<em>actual</em> magic here, aside from the power of your own imagination! But hey, you've got this!</p>
<p>Purchasing the game grants access to files that include&nbsp;both black-and-white text versions without images and full-color versions, with an extra black-and-white A5-size version that still includes an image of a book! The sizes are:</p>
<ul><li>A5 (with Letter-size coming January 2022)</li><li>Postcard (one-side only, to be completed January 2022)</li><li>Business Card (I&nbsp;need to touch this up a bit, also in January 2022)</li></ul>
<p>Not in the actual file, but included nonetheless, is my sincerest appreciation üòÄ That goes for whether you purchase the game for yourself, for a friend or loved one, tell someone about it, or pick up a community copy!&nbsp;</p>
<p>Note: there are demo versions of the A5-size files. They include the same font and text of the purchased version,&nbsp;they're merely missing the background art and additional sizes. If that's all you want, then enjoy! If you're willing and able, support via purchase is greatly appreciated and will encourage me to make even more games, but it's certainly not necessary üôÇ
</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA5MDU0MS83NzcxNTMxLnBuZw==/original/wKXbKV.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA5MDU0MS83NzcxNTM5LmpwZw==/original/H2jsDr.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA5MDU0MS83NzcxNTM3LmpwZw==/original/WEGDPP.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA5MDU0MS83NzcxNTM4LmpwZw==/original/ugwir1.jpg]]






<h1>In A World That Hates and Fears You, Living Becomes an Act of Rebellion.</h1>
<p>Exceptionals is a game inspired by x-men about and for the spaces and communities marginalized peoples make for themselves. Play as a Geno, one of little less than 0.5% percent of the population that has gone through a mysterious process called Claremont-Simonson mutation, as you try to navigate a world that won‚Äôt make room for you. Exceptionals is a game about what the mutant metaphor means to you&nbsp;and the different lenses through which we view it. Punch back and build something of worth together in this narrative tag-driven tabletop role playing game.<br>
</p>
<h4>
 Features
 </h4>
<ul><li><strong>Open-Ended Character Creation</strong><br>Mix and Match between (23) open-ended but guided protocols. Answer questions to create high concept and unique super powered characters where the only real limit is your imagination. Get invested in who you make as a whole person, and not just a set of powers.</li><li>&nbsp;<strong>Build a Community</strong><br>
 
Create a living and dynamic community space full of colorful characters. Grow your base as an anchor for other geno and help fill it with the resources they and you need. Understand how your actions effect others and gain trust through the bonds mechanic. It‚Äôs a game where you get stronger by growing your community and heal by being part of it.&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Comic Book Storytelling</strong><br>
 
Play as a creative team of writers and editors working to tell the best version of the story you can over time and storyline-based experience to model changes of the status quo and creative direction. Enjoy panel based action pacing and the ability of characters of all power levels to coexist and carry the same amount of story weight.</li><li><strong>&nbsp;Not Pain Tourism</strong><br>
 
While Exceptionals offers a number of places to push back, we understand and recognize that the most important part of a punching bag is that you choose to hit it, even if it‚Äôs not at all. We recognize not everyone gets to set the issues that the mutant metaphor is used to talk about down when they leave the table and offer many ways to tell stories outside of a lens defined by pain. We also put an emphasis and mechanical weight on the importance of joy and celebration.</li></ul>
<h4>Credits
 </h4>
<p>Written and Designed by: Gar Atkins<br>Edited by: Gar Atkins<br>Cover by: Gar Atkins and David Fernandez<br>Icons on pages (54, 58, 62, 66, 70, 74, 78, 82, 86, 92, 96, 100, 104, 108, 112, 116, 120, 124,128. 132, 136, 140, 144), DNA boarder, and X-Logo by: David Fernandez<br>Interior Art on pages (28, 44, 45, 148-150, 158, 168, 188, 198, 214) by: Gar Atkins, (240) by: Alexis Royce<br>Posters on page (96, 104) by Luke Herr<br>Poster pictures provided by: (70) Camilo Jimenez (92) Sam Moqadam, (112) Brett Jordan, The&nbsp;Creative Exchange, Abhay Padikar (120) Hrayr Movsisyan (128) Edward Howell, Noah Smith&nbsp;(132) Dieny Portinanni, Science in HD, (140) Jonathan Tomas</p>
<p>Corkboard bg: Josephine Bredehoft (54, 58, 62, 66, 70, 74, 78, 82, 86, 92, 96, 100, 104, 108, 112, 116, 120, 124,128. 132, 136, 140, 144, 215)<br>Additional Contributions: Enku, Kenneth Hyman, I. Aronson, Heather Rusk</p>
<p>
 Special Thanks: This game wasn‚Äôt made on a budget of 0 dollars. The supplies, computers,&nbsp;programs, and fonts that went into this were because of a loving community that believed in&nbsp;me and what I was making. I can‚Äôt tell you how much that means to me. All I can do is give&nbsp;you words. So take these words and know that I poured just as much love back into them.</p>
<p>Wado, Sahoni
 </p>

</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE5MzIzNi82OTYwNjcwLmpwZw==/original/DcfXSz.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE5MzIzNi82OTYwNjcxLmpwZw==/original/hn4AWG.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE5MzIzNi82OTYwNjcyLmpwZw==/original/5VknGJ.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTE5MzIzNi82OTYwNjczLmpwZw==/original/%2BdMLG9.jpg]]






<p>A one page game about discovering constellations, complete with an alternative postcard version for those who might wish to send a friend a sky of their creation.<br></p>
<p><strong>Welcome to your expansive skies!</strong><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTAyMzk2Mi81ODM5MTk1LnBuZw==/original/w9x9o%2F.png]]






<p>Faire Season is a&nbsp; GMless&nbsp; and Diceless&nbsp;tabletop roleplaying game that uses the&nbsp;<em>Belonging Outside Belonging </em>system. It draws the players into the world of Middle Ages historical reenactment and Renaissance Faires. In the midst of a dreamy and escapist week long middle ages camping event,&nbsp;&nbsp;they will find themselves drawn into a series of strange supernatural occurrences.&nbsp; A quest that is&nbsp;&nbsp;spun from ancient primal magic, and the very power of imagination itself: <em>The Dream</em>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Can these everyday people embracing their idealized selves of a mythic past survive a true quest of myth and magic? Will they be able&nbsp;to make it to pack down on the dawn of the Event's final day?</p>
<p><em>Only The Dream knows...</em></p>
<p><strong>Content Warning: </strong>Explores Adult Themes including Sexuality, Drug Use, Bullying, and Hazing.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwODQ5NS83MDUxMTA3LnBuZw==/original/OcR1PU.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwODQ5NS83MDUxMDE3LnBuZw==/original/iUgeps.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwODQ5NS83MDUxMDE1LnBuZw==/original/S3RjTa.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIwODQ5NS83MDUxMDE2LnBuZw==/original/jtUyeX.png]]






<p><strong>Fairy Corgi Steeplechase</strong></p>
<hr>
<p><em>Fairies used to ride corgis into battle, but now they ride for fun and prestige. You‚Äôre an up-and-coming trainer of racing teams, and this year you‚Äôve been invited to the Cravat Crown races! Will your team win the glory?</em></p>
<hr>
<p>Needed to play: 1d10 per player, pencil and paper, a love of cute things</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQxNDQ2ODcucG5n/original/Pfpv5Q.png]]






<p><em>BOOK OF CHAMPIONS is the standalone sequel/expansion to&nbsp;<a href="https://spc.itch.io/fakechess" target="_blank">FAKE CHESS</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;<br></em><em>Both games are available in print at <a href="https://shop.seanpatrickcain.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">shop.seanpatrickcain.com</a>.</em></p>
<p><br></p>
<p class="text-center">* * *</p>
<h3 class="text-center">"A ludicrous game of pretend."</h3>
<p class="text-center">Oscar, <em>The Ugly Monster</em></p>
<p><br></p>
<h3 class="text-center">"I roleplayed a hustler who kept making reckless wagers during a chess game. My opponent was a know-it-all wizardly tutor who hated J. K. Rowling. Fake Chess is just brilliant."</h3>
<p class="text-center"><a href="https://ludipe.itch.io/" target="_blank">Ludipe</a>, game designer<br></p>
<p class="text-center"><br></p>
<h3 class="text-center">"It's rare that a game makes me laugh out loud. This really is a brilliant game, there's no other word for it."</h3>
<p class="text-center"><a href="https://alrine.itch.io/" target="_blank">Alex Rinehart</a>, designer of Cyberrats &amp; Gratitude</p>
<p class="text-center"><br></p>
<p class="text-center">* * *</p>
<p><br></p>
<h3>WHAT IS FAKE CHESS?</h3>
<p>Chess is a game of vast complexity and a 1500-year history.</p>
<p>Fake Chess is not.</p>
<p>Fake Chess players use&nbsp;a very basic set of rules and mechanics to live out their grandmaster fantasies by <em>act</em><em>ing</em> like serious chess players, engaging in what looks like an intense battle without the burdens of chess strategy, knowledge, or skill.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<p class="text-center">* * *</p>
<p><br></p>
<h3>THE BOOK OF CHAMPIONS</h3>
<p>With the BOOK OF CHAMPIONS&nbsp;at the table, players can now embody specific characters with unique moves, strategies, and play styles.&nbsp;</p>
<ul><li>Grind your way to riches as&nbsp;<strong>The City Park Hustler</strong><br>
</li><li>Guide your prot√©g√©&nbsp;as&nbsp;<strong>The Benevolent Mentor</strong></li><li>Pop some pills and stare at the ceiling as&nbsp;<strong>The Drug-Addled Queen</strong></li><li>Giggle your way to victory as&nbsp;<strong>The Child Prodigy</strong></li><li>Nurse your hangover as&nbsp;<strong>The Haggard Celeb</strong><br>
</li><li>Chill your opponent's heat as&nbsp;<strong>The Icy&nbsp;Russian</strong></li><li>Take your time as&nbsp;<strong>The Cerebral Snail</strong></li><li>Dazzle and charm as&nbsp;<strong>The Magnanimous Hottie</strong></li><li>Help (and annoy) new players as&nbsp;<strong>The Wizardly&nbsp;Tutor</strong></li><li>Beep and bloop as&nbsp;<strong>The Chess Computer</strong></li><li>Take a life as&nbsp;<strong>The Angel of Death</strong></li><li>Get meta as <strong>The Fake Chess Player</strong></li></ul>
<p>It's dramatic.&nbsp; It is silly.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>It might be a real game, but it's definitely fake chess.<br></p>
<p><br></p>
<p class="text-center"><em>* * *</em><br></p>
<h3>"I never had any interest in chess whatsoever until I came across this game. I also never had any interest in full-on method acting a character in any TTRPG until I read the list of Champions that Sean designed for us: so clearly defined, in such a simple but compelling way. I was stricken with a sudden urge to wear a blazer, learn Russian, or create names for chess openings and strategies on a gloomy Sunday morning. Fake Chess has elegant, easy-to-learn mechanics, and a perfectly conveyed vibe. It also has a move that lets you call JK Rowling a TERF, which kills two birds with one stone. Shout ‚Äúcheckmate‚Äù, bang the table with your fist and play this game. "</h3>
<p><a href="https://twitter.com/armandah17" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Armanda Haller</a>, designer of&nbsp;<a href="http://armandah.itch.io" target="_blank">Paranoid Android</a> &amp;&nbsp;<a href="http://armandah.itch.io" target="_blank">Teenage Angst</a> </p>
<p><em><br></em></p>
<p class="text-center"><em>* * *</em></p>
<h3>MEDIA</h3>
<p>The Dicebreaker Podcast crew discusses Fake Chess :</p>
<div class=""><div class=""><iframe width="500" height="281" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Q7uii9__qdo" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe></div><br></div>
<p>Sean joins Two&nbsp;Can Play That Game to discuss Fake Chess (starting at 44:00):</p>
<iframe src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/2EW1tApfbA54LiDiPNRcxG?utm_source=generator&amp;theme=0&amp;t=2640" width="100%" height="152" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
<p><br></p>
<p><em><br></em></p>
<p class="text-center"><em>* * *</em></p>
<p><br></p>
<p><em>Fake Chess: Book of Champions requires a real chess set.&nbsp;&nbsp;</em><br></p>
<p><em>While the Book of Champions contains 33 new game boards that are fully compatible with the original Fake Chess,&nbsp;&nbsp;players do not need to own the original to play.</em></p>
<p><em>Content Warnings: Drug use, profanity&nbsp;</em></p>

<iframe width="720" height="450" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Q7uii9__qdo" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3Mzk4OC83NDE4NjU0LmpwZw==/original/2s6jLP.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3Mzk4OC83NTc0NTU0LmpwZw==/original/tFMN2j.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3Mzk4OC83NTc0NTQ0LmpwZw==/original/EGzBV9.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3Mzk4OC83NTc0NTUzLmpwZw==/original/P%2BcgJ4.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI3Mzk4OC83NDE4NjI3LmpwZw==/original/iO3USL.jpg]]






<p></p>
<p>When Silent Hill came on the scene, it was unlike anything that had come before. The game redefined horror in the gaming industry and cemented a legacy that lasts today, (in spite of Konami, of course).&nbsp;</p>
<p>This book discusses the story and symbolism of the first game, from start to finish. This includes scripts from the Silent Hill Symbolism series, things that were cut from videos, and new research never seen before; as well as seven chapters dedicated to the series as a whole and the larger mythos.<br></p>
<p></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc5NzM5NTAuanBn/original/%2BKeyx%2B.jpg]]






<h2>It's not safe out there</h2>
<p>But for some reason, you and your friends have chosen to go. You have made the conscious decision to go and see the things that go bump in the dark. You know it will change you. Perhaps it already has. After all, would you have gone there before? Were you the kind of person who let their friends drag them into such madness? Or perhaps you were. Perhaps you have led them here.</p>
<p>Perhaps, in time, you will forgive yourself for what you have all become.</p>
<h3>Personnal Horror</h3>
<p>This book is a rules framework inspired by classics like Call of Cthulhu as much as it is by new faces like Blades in the Dark and Apocalypse World.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The game is mainly played rolling dice and having a Discussion with the Keeper about what can and cannot be done. When consequences might befall the investigators, the Keeper will set in how much trouble the&nbsp;character is when making the roll, and the roll allows you to see whether success&nbsp;is achieved easily or at the cost of your equipment, energy, health, or sanity. With time, and in some cases, your characters might devellopt strange coping mechanisms, or be branded by the Strange, with curses them, making them alien to humanity.</p>
<p>This simple, story-driven system puts players in control of their narrative and how the Strange changes them. Perhaps you will push out the Strange. Perhaps, instead, you will let it brand you, forever barring you from a normal life. This is a game about taking risks and hard bargains in order to get to the truth of a mistery.</p>
<p>You will also find tips and tricks for game masters, as well as a mistery generator for those of you who enjoy a bit of randomness in your writing prompts, and a small mistery to get you started.&nbsp;</p>
<p>I hope to give you all you need to build your own brand of horror, and run with it.<br></p>
<p>This game was written, laid out and illustrated by Ribston Pippin, with cover art and tittle&nbsp;by Sarah Carapace.<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTcwNzI2LzU2MDE5MjUuanBn/original/i3%2BA7r.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTcwNzI2LzU2MDE4MTUucG5n/original/tQmD6h.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTcwNzI2LzU2MDE4MTQucG5n/original/NDHi6l.png]]






<p class="text-center"><em>In the forgotten country there is a field of the tallest grass. Swaying stalks weave gently through low hanging clouds. The sky above tints in reflection of an endless verdant sea.&nbsp;</em> </p>
<p><em>Field of the Tallest Grass</em> is a small and serene supplement for any TTRPG system. Set in and around a magnificent field, this one-page zine can easily be used as a setting for an rpg session in any number of themes and genres.</p>
<p>The zine contains:</p>
<ul><li>An NPC in a rocking chair</li><li>A unique magic item (powered by the spirit of worker solidarity)</li><li>Event tables&nbsp;</li></ul>
<p>Art by Perplexing Ruins:<a href="https://www.patreon.com/perplexingruins" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://www.patreon.com/perplexingruins</a></p>
<p>Zine Template and Folding Instructions by Starwest:&nbsp;<a href="https://starwest.itch.io/one-page-zine-template">https://starwest.itch.io/one-page-zine-template</a></p>
<p>¬©DonnieDynamo<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI0NDcxMC83MjYxNTcyLnBuZw==/original/9bKT6E.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI0NDcxMC83MjYxNTgwLnBuZw==/original/UZDdd5.png]]






<p>Fighting Delivery Felines(ASHCAN edition) based on an anime your characters are delivery (chibi or not)&nbsp;felines battling through a city that is as gonzo as you want it to be. From ancient times to far future, from dinosaur taxis to robot maids. Transform or already be in your battle gear as you attempt to get food from HQ to that party/office worker/stressed out family.</p>
<p>What is an ashcan edition? This is an early release version we want to add more to and the funds we make will help us add to the game. We plan to add audio files with someone reading the book. We will also rewrite the rules to be newer gamer friendly. We also plan to add more art work too.<br></p>
<p>This version has a low and high resolution versions.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Role Character Sheet Link -&nbsp;<a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/3872affb-fighting-delivery-felines-cs/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/3872affb-fighting-delivery-felines-cs/s...</a></p>
<p>Role Restaurant Sheet Link -&nbsp;<a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/84aaad5d-fdf-restaurant-sheet/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/84aaad5d-fdf-restaurant-sheet/save</a></p>
<p>Role Team Sheet Link -&nbsp;<a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/84aaad5d-fdf-restaurant-sheet/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/84aaad5d-fdf-restaurant-sheet/save</a></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgxNDU3ODUuanBn/original/XWO1f5.jpg]]






''Enter exact rating'': <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/CollectTags/searchWord" placeholder="5.0" default="5.0" tag="input" type="text" size=2/>

<$list filter="[has:field[url]field:rating{$:/temp/CollectTags/searchWord}]">
"""
<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link>
"""
</$list>






<p><br></p>
<figure><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzIxMTMxNTIucG5n/original/%2BgQE%2Bx.png" style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit" loading="lazy"><br></figure>
<p><strong>For the Dungeon!</strong>&nbsp;is a comedy role-playing game where you get to play as the hapless minions instead of the heroes. Experience the rush of unquestioning loyalty to a darker power and charging into danger with reckless abandon! Raid villages, scout ancient ruins for artifacts, and protect the dungeon from homicidal adventurers.</p>
<p>Instead of a well established world, the game uses principles taken from Powered by the Apocalypse style games and improv comedy to create the setting.&nbsp;<strong>For the Dungeon!</strong>&nbsp;relies heavily on player created prompts that are interpreted by the Game Master to reveal the details of the world.</p>
<p>The game is designed to be fast-paced, with a focus on creating memorable moments. Because the game is light and has a greater focus on the story, anybody can pick up and play with minimal effort. The fun is created more through the unexpected scenarios the players get themselves into than by studying rules.</p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzIxMTMxNTQucG5n/original/pGhoUT.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p>So how do you play? Characters are represented by a set of short descriptions called traits. They cover a character's skills, equipment, and motivations. Traits provide an easy way to know both who your character is and what they're good at.</p>
<p>Something inherent to being a minion is their penchant for chaos. Critical failures are a core part of what makes the game unique and fun. Whenever the characters critically fail the player provides a prompt that the Game Master uses as inspiration for whatever hilariously unexpected misfortune befalls them.</p>
<p>With failure comes experience. When a minion rolls a critical failure they write down what they learned from the experience instead of tracking experience points. These experiences can be used just like traits, but only as long as you continue to succeed.</p>
<p>In addition to playing as a minion, all players get to influence what is going on in the dungeon. During downtime, players choose from a handful of dungeon actions that alter the world to naturally create interesting story hooks to pursue.</p>
<p><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMzkzOTMyLzI0MTAzOTcucG5n/original/lC9Ubt.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMzkzOTMyLzI0MTAzODMucG5n/original/bVdxcy.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMzkzOTMyLzI0MTAzOTgucG5n/original/v%2BB3Uj.png]]






<p>This is a <a href="https://forthequeengame.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Descended from the Queen</a> game, that focuses on developing queer relationship dynamics. You play as a group on a mission for your war-torn land. Among you is a being of royalty. A radiant figure, free of gender and loved by each one of you. They are known as <strong>The Queen.</strong></p>
<p>To play this game you'll need a standard deck of 52 cards and 3+ more players. <span></span></p>
<p><strong></strong></p>
<p><span></span></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgxNDU5NjgucG5n/original/0rxuJl.png]]






<p class="text-right"><span class="">you are gods.</span><br><span class="">infinite, all encompassing,</span><br><em>Forgotten</em><span class="">.</span></p>
<p class="text-right"><span class="">Forgotten gods, trapped,</span><br><span class="">adrift in the cosmos,</span><br><span class="">left behind by a society</span><br><span class="">that no longer wanted you.</span><br></p>
<p class="text-right">but you weren't Forgotten alone.</p>
<p class="text-center">~*~<br></p>
<p><em>FORGOTTEN GODS </em>is a game about otherness and clutching each other tightly in the face of the uncaring.</p>
<p>write letters to each other. remember who you were, who you are, who you will become.&nbsp;</p><p>for each copy of <em>FORGOTTEN GODS</em> purchased, another community copy will be added to the pool.<br></p>
<p class="text-center">~*~</p>
<p>for safety tool recommendations, please see <a href="https://t.co/4WfWJ3hjsY?amp=1" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">the ttrpg safety toolkit</a>.</p>
<p><em>the ttrpg safety toolkit is a resource co-curated by kienna shaw and lauren bryant-monk. the ttrpg safety toolkit is a compilation of safety tools that have been designed by members of the tabletop roleplaying games community for use by players and gms at the table. </em></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQxMzI3NDEucG5n/original/WrQRyA.png]]






<p>In <em>Four Sherlock Holmes and a Vampire (Who Is Also One of the Aforementioned Sherlock&nbsp;</em><em>Holmes)</em>‚Äîofficially abbreviated as either <em>Four Sherlock Holmes and a Vampire</em> or <em>FSHV</em>‚Äîfour&nbsp;players play four Sherlock Holmes who team up to solve mysteries and one-up each other. Secretly,&nbsp;one or more Sherlock Holmes may be vampires. Can the four Sherlock Holmes find out who&nbsp;among them could be a creature of the night?</p><p><br></p><p>This is a PDF copy and a narrated MP3 copy of the RPG "Four Sherlock Holmes and a Vampire (Who Is Also One of the Aforementioned Sherlock Holmes)". This RPG is designed for four players, and it does not require a game master. It is two pages long and contains some public domain images. This game requires one six-sided die (a d6), one twenty-sided die (a d20), paper, and pencils to play.<br><br>(This game was inspired by Justin McElroy of The Adventure Zone podcast.)<br><br>Enjoy!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzI2MTcwNzYucG5n/original/LTz3tb.png]]






<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQ5OTQyNTUucG5n/original/nxkzmH.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p>A never ending abstract landscape of rhythm and soft glamour. Wander the halls, rooms, and chambers. Encounter strange Denizens and get to know them better; befriend them, fall in love, just chill. Try and fill out your own blurred edges.</p>
<p>Fractal Romance is a tabletop role playing hangout. You will pick up a character to play and explore the Fractal Palace, generating its infinite sprawl and the Denizens that inhabit it, as you play.</p>
<p>You will need a deck of cards, a few friends, and a willingness to explore some chill times.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Fractal Romance was written for the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/record-collection-2k21" target="_blank">2021 Record Collection Jam</a>, and is inspired by the album&nbsp;<em>Swimmer</em> by Tennis.</p>
<p>&nbsp;Go check out the rest of the entries!</p>
<p><iframe src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/3vghyeIx26jtU7DdAW2bEb" width="300" height="380" frameborder="0"></iframe><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODg1OTIzLzQ5OTQyMTIuanBn/original/IE2WWj.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODg1OTIzLzQ5OTQyNzkucG5n/original/MgL7GD.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODg1OTIzLzQ5OTQyMTMucG5n/original/2Kr513.png]]






<p>The year is 2202; over sixty years have passed since the end of the Great War and the Purge that followed plunging the world into a modern dark age.&nbsp; Since then man has struggled to rebuild, to find some fragment of stability they had before the generations lost to war. For most, the world is a cold and cruel place, the gap between rich and poor ever widening. The masses, undereducated, placated with cheap distractions and great television.</p>
<p>Under the static and the lies are other worlds, four Realms, the Dark, Grave, Slumber, and Verdant, places of fantastical beauty and horror. Secret places that share their gifts with those strong enough to take them. These are the Lucid, existing between the worlds and shadows. In the shadows, empires, known as Baronies, manipulate the world as they seek unknowable goals.</p>
<p>It is here that secret wars unfold, unknown to the Waking World. It is here that only the most cunning may survive outside the control of others. It is here that one may find freedom. All it costs is everything else.&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>Blending action, conspiracy, and horror into a unique world, Fractured Kingdom puts the players in the heart of the mystery from the beginning.&nbsp; Players take on the role of Lucid, able to tap into one of the four Outer Realms they struggle to survive in the industrial landscape of 2202. Every shadow holds the possibility of new nightmares, and not even one's dreams are safe.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>The Fractured Kingdom core book provides:&nbsp;</p>
<ul><li>Fully detailed character creation using the new Open Action System, providing players unique of ways to customize their characters.</li><li>World setting, including details on the Four Outer Realms, supernatural places the characters draw power.</li><li>Details on seven Baronies, shadow organizations that manipulate both supernatural world and events of the mundane.</li><li>Creatures of the Realms along with antagonists, both mundane and supernatural.</li><li>The Open Action System encourages dramatic play rewarding character‚Äôs backgrounds and player creativity.</li><li>An introductory adventure for new players to put them right into the action including ready to play characters.</li><li>236 pages including artwork by Adam Sward.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li></ul>
<p><span style="color: inherit">Make sure to visit the website </span><a href="http://www.FracturedKingdom.com" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">www.FracturedKingdom.com</a><span style="color: inherit"> for free updates, discussions on the setting, people and places.</span></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMzc5NDM2LzE5MDA4OTcuanBn/original/HZUBS4.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMzc5NDM2LzE5MDA4NTMuanBn/original/5tyeqo.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMzc5NDM2LzE5MDA4NTQuanBn/original/hKW4rx.jpg]]






<p>A lasers and feelings hack about being a smart frog! Currently a placeholder so I can submit this to a bundle. I haven't had time to write it up yet, but your two stats are frog and science. Also, it will have many puns.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgyODcyMTcucG5n/original/UCfmmW.png]]






<p>Filth Smeared Gnome Issue 4: Gay Crime, Sapphics Against Capital</p>
<p>The&nbsp;everyday cruelty of petty market lords is a terrible enough thing to combat, but of course the rich assholes have magic too.&nbsp;Clues to the myriad death cults of capital lie nearly naked all around.&nbsp;It's safe to assume most folx with MBAs regularly sacrifice the poor not just as a source for wealth, but for immortality and other preternatural boons.</p>
<p>These are the queer women standing in the rich cultists' way. The time for direct political action is now.&nbsp;</p>
<p>This is a deconstructed zine for use with the Troika! Tabletop Roleplaying Game featuring: 5 Backgrounds&nbsp;and a Modern Fantasy Microsetting, complete&nbsp;with an introductory assassination!&nbsp;</p>
<p>This zine is split across 7 .pdfs:&nbsp;</p>
<p>1 .pdf with a very brief&nbsp;overview.</p>
<p>1 .pdf for EACH Background. (Just send each player the info they need!)&nbsp;</p>
<ul><li>Gay Girl w/ Big Mom Energy&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Butch, Lesbian Prole&nbsp;</li><li>NeoNomadic, Oracular Pansexual Gal&nbsp;</li><li>Wise and World-Weary Queer Femme&nbsp;</li><li>Sapphic, Transgender Trash Witch.</li></ul>
<p>AND 1 with the Introductory Assassination of Herold Reeves-Danson.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODI4MzkxLzQ2NDIzNjguanBn/original/p%2F8Lrk.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODI4MzkxLzQ2NDIzNjcuanBn/original/A6W%2BHz.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvODI4MzkxLzQ2NDIzNjkucG5n/original/5uLe3r.png]]






<p>Welcome to Gambit! Your TTRPG experience is about to get an upgrade...<br></p>
<p>Gambit is a simple,&nbsp; adaptable, modular,&nbsp;playing card based storytelling system with 3 levels of intensity, to suit the preferences of any Player group.</p>
<p>Grab yourself the pdf and give Gambit a shot!</p>
<p>If you'd like a game to go with it, do check out <a href="https://leekhulme.itch.io/the-nest" target="_blank">The Nest</a>, a Superhero scenario created specially to work with Gambit (which comes bundled with the system rules).</p><p>If you like the system, there's a second iteration of it over <a href="http://leekhulme.itch.io/gambit-surprise" target="_blank">here</a>, made for a different <a href="http://leekhulme.itch.io/surprise" target="_blank">game</a> but available standalone, too.</p>
<p>For updates, and to hear about new Gambit games, follow me here or <a href="http://twitter.com/leehulme" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">on twitter</a>, and do leave reviews and comments! Your feedback helps both me, and others.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc4ODA1NTIucG5n/original/541arJ.png]]






<p class="text-center"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgyOTIwNjAucG5n/original/3xD64S.png" loading="lazy"><br></p><p>Welcome to Gambit! If this is your first journey with this system, then you're in for a treat. Gambit is simple to learn, resolves quickly, and allows for tactics as deep as you want to make them.</p>
<p>With the same 3 suggested Intensity levels, and the same modular, adaptable framework, as the OG,&nbsp;Gambit: Surprise! edition is perfect for a GM and 2 or 4 Players.</p>
<p>If you'd like to play the game we adapted this version for, that's right <a href="http://leekhulme.itch.co.uk/surprise" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>
<p>Click on my profile for links to the OG Gambit, the OG Gambit game, and more incoming!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgxOTgwMTcucG5n/original/VRkoWs.png]]






<p><em>For over thirty years, starting in the 1980s, telephones in the shape of the orange cartoon cat Garfield were found washed up on the shores of a beach in northwestern France. Nobody knew where the phones were coming from. It was a big mess, but also a little nostalgic and theoretically could be used to contact somebody far away.</em></p>
<p>This is a two player RPG about a person experiencing major milestones in their life, at which time they also are visited by Garfield. One player plays the Human, and the other plays Garfield. Garfield is also a phone.</p>
<p><br>Made for The 2020 Folklore Jam, operating under a very loose definition of folklore. Garfield is copyright Paws, Inc and is in no way my creation nor a being who exists to lure humans astray for the sake of a fell master and I'm not accepting payments please do not sue me. <br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQxMjcyMzguanBn/original/%2FdQfuf.jpg]]






<p><em>Generational </em>isn‚Äôt a TTRPG. It is an improvisational and collaborative way to tell a story that spans eons and creates a history of an entire world. The rules contained within are here to help foster a unique world history every time you play.</p>
<p>Generational is a stand-alone game, but feel free to create homebrew or adapt the game as you like. While it doesn't have any roleplaying rules, feel free to use whichever system you like to if you want to play a traditional RPG within the world you created.</p>
<p>Players have said:<img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3NjM1NjEucG5n/original/FCdnP1.png" style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><br></p>
<p><a href="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"><img alt="Creative Commons License" style="border-width:0" src="https://i.creativecommons.org/l/by-sa/4.0/88x31.png" loading="lazy"></a><br><span>Generational: A Story about Stories</span> by <a href="https://propernerdy.itch.io/generational">ProperNerdy</a> is licensed under a <a href="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License</a>.<br></p>

<iframe width="720" height="450" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0pS5QPpI0ZM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzYxNTIwODMucG5n/original/%2BQjVMU.png]]






<p>The children of those with ancestry in the higher planes and those with ancestry in the lower planes, the Gevallen are a powerful thing to behold. Creatures beyond most mortal comprehension, they are often torn by their conflicting inheritance and look to become something more.</p>
<p>This is supplementary content for the fifth edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game, ready to be added to your campaigns.&nbsp;</p><p>Supplements produced by Monarch Arts range from classes, monsters, items, mechanics and everything in-between.</p>
<p>You can also check out the Monarch Arts Discord <a href="https://discord.gg/X44KGNY" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgzODUzMTcucG5n/original/tKWCTJ.png]]






<p>Welcome to GDEC!</p>
<p>Thank you for your interest in our company. We're incredibly excited to welcome you to the ranks of the Global Dragon Egg Conservation!&nbsp;</p>
<ul><li>Journal each day with the Dragon Eggs you've been given to take care of.&nbsp;</li><li>Use a deck of cards to randomly generate story prompts, such as egg elements and preferred nesting materials!</li><li>Overcome adversity and grow along with your eggs!</li><li>Watch your beautiful babies fly away knowing you've done something amazing.</li></ul>
<p>This was a quick game idea I had and wanted to throw onto paper. Total time: 1 day.&nbsp;It's not fancy, it doesn't look like much but it's a lot of fun. I enjoyed the prompts when I played, and I hope you do the same. Enjoy a wholesome game!</p>
<p>Have fun writing! I hope this helps you get some of those creative juices flowing.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3ODcyOTAucG5n/original/4znV%2Fk.png]]






<p></p>
<p>The imagination of a child is one of the purest forms of magic. It can take molded plastic or stitched fabric and turn it into a living thing. Of course the child can never be aware of that. Just think of the consequences of knowing your toys had thoughts and feelings and were ever present.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Toys have a task beyond basic play. They're here to protect their human child. Because out of the same imagination that created these toy guardians (called Toy Goons), evil shapeshifting Bougee are also made. The Bougee want nothing more than to feed on a child's worst fears.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Goons in Toyland is an RPG based upon Nate Treme's "Tunnel Goons" and the world created in The Chaos Grenade's "Shroom Goons". A knowledge of either system or setting aren't needed. Goons in Toyland is meant to be enjoyed by the young or the young at heart. All that you need is 2 six sided dice, pencil, paper, this book, and plenty of imagination!</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQwMzg2NTEuanBn/original/YU3sg0.jpg]]






<p>The Lower Puffington Ladies‚Äô Auxiliary Society is determined to win the annual Billinghamshire County Best Village award. However, the village is not immune to trouble, and it falls upon these community-minded seniors to set things back to their right and proper place.</p>
<p>Grandma Club is a one page RPG that can be played with a single six-sided die. It reqires one GM (Great Matriarch) and at least one OAP (Old Age Player.)</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzMyMDMyMzIuanBn/original/qBpCkA.jpg]]






<p>Greetings From ______ is a mapmaking/worldbuilding game for 1-6 players. Players take turns moving around the map and creating what they find there. Work together to build a unique world that can be used for other role-playing systems, creating stories, or whatever else you might want to use it for (because sometimes you just want to make a cool map). <br><br>There is a "Brochure Version" for in-person play as well as an option to "Play by Text" for long distance mapmaking. <br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQwMTk3NC84MTg2NDUzLmpwZw==/original/dXxFFs.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQwMTk3NC84MTk0MTc3LmpwZw==/original/DIWS%2BW.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQwMTk3NC84MTg2NDU0LmpwZw==/original/QFTN8A.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQwMTk3NC84MTc4NTk3LmpwZw==/original/InZFI6.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQwMTk3NC84MTg2NDU1LmpwZw==/original/NSLH9%2F.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQwMTk3NC84MTc4NTk5LmpwZw==/original/NeUWjR.jpg]]






<h6><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2NTg1NjcucG5n/original/ln8TfP.png" loading="lazy"></h6>
<p>As a gamemaster, giving your players magic items feels good. As a player, getting them feels good too. But too often the items, canon or  homebrew, are either so dull they collect dust in the player‚Äôs inventory  - or worse, so overpowered you risk upsetting the balance between  players or the entire narrative of your campaign.</p>
<p>In an ocean of +1 Swords of Genericism, <em>Grinderbin's Mobile Market of  Ridiculous Magic Items</em> is a collection of over 120 strange and unique  magic items designed to be fun for players without breaking your game.  Both quirky and quick to put into play, every piece of armor, weapon,  tool, and hovering donkey is created and curated to inspire‚Äîand  require‚Äîthe creativity of everyone at the table.
    </p>
<p>There‚Äôs nothing as dull as a Froststone Maul or as dangerous as the  Deck of Ruining Campaigns in Grinderbin‚Äôs shop. These items invite  players to interact with them regularly in all aspects of the game. That  enables you, the Gamemaster, to give them out frequently and get the  joy of seeing your players smile.Their quirks and oddities are a  feature, not a bug: fun enough for a little side-quest or just to add  unique flavor to an existing narrative within your world.
    </p>
<p>What do you say? Up for a bit of adventure with your purchase?
    </p>
<p><em>*All items and the adventure are system and level agnostic, allowing them to work with whatever RPG you prefer and so you can use them for characters of any level.<br></em><br></p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2NTgzMjUucG5n/original/JYZOxy.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p>A 77 page document containing:<br></p>
<ul><li>120+ ridiculous magic items (weapons, armor, clothing, jewelry, and more)<em> </em>with effects, a sales pitch, an upgrade path, and art&nbsp;for&nbsp;each</li><li>All items are system and power-level agnostic, so you can use them in any system and for players of any experience level</li><li>A friendly, fleshed-out <a href="https://rexiconjesse.itch.io/one-page-lore-fantasy-folk">dikarya</a> NPC (Grinderbin) you can insert anywhere and in any campaign due to their mobile market</li><li>An complete adventure written by <a href="https://twitter.com/100thingsilove" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Steffie de Vaan</a> to introduce players to Grinderbin, their mobile market, new allies, and new adversaries. It&nbsp;also provides plot hooks to tie events into your story, and gives methods to expand your narrative with new characters and plot points the adventure provides</li></ul>
<p><strong>In addition</strong>, you'll get a folder that contains each item as a separate image organized by category; allowing you  to easily share items via virtual table tops, Discord, or print them  out to make fancy cards.<br><br></p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2NTg0MjEucG5n/original/ncfiR7.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p><em>
    </em></p>
<p><em>
    </em></p>
<p>Check out the<em> <em>WTF Is My Ridiculous Magic Item Generator</em> </em>at<strong> <a href="https://tinyurl.com/RidiculousMagicItem" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">tinyurl.com/RidiculousMagicItem</a></strong><strong> </strong>(or<strong> <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l8PhVSxlUbj-4VncFRXWQReLBmS4mou34M2iK6BTuo4" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l8PhVSxlUbj-4VncFRXWQReLBmS4mou34M2iK6BT...</a></strong> if you want the direct link).
<br></p>
<figure><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2NzgzMDMucG5n/original/3OyEJQ.png" loading="lazy"></figure>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzNjEyNC83NjI2NDEwLmpwZw==/original/tZlqUo.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzNjEyNC83NjI2NDI0LmpwZw==/original/V88oFU.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzNjEyNC83NjI3MTg3LmpwZw==/original/q988cI.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzNjEyNC83NjI2NDE2LmpwZw==/original/2ovlZy.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzNjEyNC83NjM0MTkyLmpwZw==/original/bNrH3Z.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzNjEyNC83NjI2NDQ2LmpwZw==/original/swqvTN.jpg]]






<p>A team of supers have been called together to tackle a threat to the world. No one of them can do it alone, the world needs them all to work together this time. Which means <em>they</em> need <em>you</em> to work together. You are each of the supers‚Äô unremarkable confidants, best friends, and allies who help them from home base. During this great time of need, you will need to work with the other uBFFs (unremarkable BFFs) to assist the team flawlessly.</p><p><a href="https://app.playrole.com/sheet-templates/c1b40464-guys-in-chairs/save" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Character sheet in Role</a></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc4MTQxOTAucG5n/original/5SZZSL.png]]






<p>Halo 'n' Horns is a comedy micro RPG for two GMs ‚Äî an angel and a devil&nbsp;‚Äî and one player:&nbsp;the mortal they're trying to win over.</p>
<p>Play this game on stream, record it for a podcast release, or in front of a live studio audience!&nbsp;This game is meant to be performed for a crowd. The goofier ya get, the better.</p>
<p>Halo 'n' Horns is part of my one-page actual play series:&nbsp;micro RPGs designed with performers and an audience in mind.</p>
<p>Special thanks to my Patreon Paladins for making this game possible:&nbsp;Brooke Brite, Emily Chang, Jon Johnsick,&nbsp;Laura Boylan (Champion), and Paul Baranay.</p>
<p>If you wanna get exclusive rewards like sneak peeks of WIPs, GM tips, Q&amp;A livestreams, and more, check out my <a href="http://patreon.com/byconniechang" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Patreon</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzY0NTE1ODkucG5n/original/7CzB91.png]]






<p>A submission to the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/desert-bus-for-hope-2021-game-jam">2021 Desert Bus For Hope Game Jam</a>. <br></p>
<p>You are a long-haul trucker, traveling the highways of North America with yourself, your sleeper cab, and your CB radio. Weird shit is just part of your life these days. If you're lucky, the weirdest thing that will happen is that you find out your waitress is a vampire. Werewolves, fairies, aliens, shadow people, you've met 'em all. But you still have deliveries to make and a schedule to keep.</p>
<p><strong>To play </strong><em>Haulways Trucking Inc.</em><strong>, you will need:<br></strong></p>
<ul><li>Time, perhaps 15-20 minutes a day<br>
</li><li>The rules&nbsp;
</li><li>A journal and pens/pencils, or a word processor
</li><li>A d100, or 2d10
</li><li>Your imagination
</li><li>Optional: a map or GPS app
</li></ul>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc0NTY4NzQuanBn/original/TQ3eM9.jpg]]






<p>As the year draws to a close, the knights of the realm come together to share stories of their year's exploits.&nbsp;</p>
<p>A storytelling game written for the <a href="https://itch.io/jam/holiday-ttrpg-jam">Holiday Jam</a> by <a href="https://whimsy-machine.itch.io/">Whimsy Machine</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc2NzIzNzQuanBn/original/wPPny9.jpg]]






<p>You have been held in Hell for hundreds of years.&nbsp; Now, finally, you have been given a chance to escape; by winning the golf tournament held every 666 years!&nbsp; Which really is an awful choice, but it's the best you've got.&nbsp; Can you defeat the other competitors to escape from Golf Hell, or will you be trapped here for all eternity?</p>
<p>Hell Holes is a competitive fantasy golf dice game for 1-6 players.&nbsp; Each time it is your turn, you will select your club and roll dice to see how your shot went.&nbsp;&nbsp;Hopefully, you stayed on the course and did not stray into any of the fantastic dangers of the Circle you are competing on at the time.&nbsp; As you play your way through the nine Circles of Old Hell&nbsp;Downs, the demonic Caddy will interfere by offering special clubs to whoever is in last place at the end of a circle.&nbsp; Only by playing better than&nbsp;your fellow golfers (or maybe being luckier than them)&nbsp;can you escape&nbsp;Golf Hell!</p>
<p>You will need a pair of ten-sided dice (or an electronic dice roller, or a numbered spinner, or some other way to generate random numbers between 1 and 10) to play Hell&nbsp;Holes.</p>
<p>Purchases at $6.00 or above add a community copy to the pool for other community members who may be interested in the game, but unable or unwilling to purchase it, to claim and enjoy Hell Holes themselves.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxNzc1LzQwNjkwODQucG5n/original/0wSrmc.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxNzc1LzQwNjkwOTIucG5n/original/F%2BiNiW.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvNzMxNzc1LzQwNjkwOTMucG5n/original/LM6xk1.png]]






<p>I totally get it.&nbsp;<em></em><a href="https://www.powerlanguage.co.uk/wordle/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Wordle</a> is an awesome game! But those results shapes are so awesome, and they're just begging to be used somewhere else...</p>
<p>That's where <em>Herdle</em> comes in! Now you'll get to corral all of those wild results shapes into your own personal fields, scoring points for each row and column you can fill, and scoring even MORE for each cow (yellow square)&nbsp;you enclose within fences (green squares).</p>
<p>The single PDF includes four pages of rules, one page of four fields (play sheets)&nbsp;and one page of nine card-sized cutouts that you can fill in with your own results, friends' results, or just fun shapes you come across online!</p>
<p>Note: While the game is complete, it's not playtested yet. I also really wanna get a list of results for solo players (as in, if you earn [x] points you're the greatest farmer ever, etc) and a few pages of already-filled-in results cards for people who don't wanna peruse Twitter for results. I&nbsp;also still need to make the printer-friendly edition (for now you can just read the rules on the screen ‚Äîthey're simple anyway!‚Äî and print the score sheets in black and white if needed). As such,&nbsp;<strong><em>the game will be on sale for 99 cents until I get all of these things done! I'll make sure to send out an update when it's all complete, and then you can grab the updated files&nbsp;:D</em></strong></p><p>Note 2: I&nbsp;had to set an end date for the sale so I went with a week. If it's not done by then I'll add another week, but hopefully that won't be the case lol</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MDMzOS84MDM5ODUxLnBuZw==/original/vS0XDG.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MDMzOS84MDM5ODUzLmpwZw==/original/94nje9.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MDMzOS84MDM5ODUyLmpwZw==/original/Ggj0B%2B.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MDMzOS84MDM5ODU0LmpwZw==/original/aFm%2F6z.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MDMzOS84MDM5ODU1LmpwZw==/original/FNooDe.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTM4MDMzOS84MDM5ODU2LmpwZw==/original/dkus8s.jpg]]






<p>Here &amp; Far is a solo GM-less journaling game about being with another person, but unable to communicate with them.</p>
<p>The game uses scenarios to bring&nbsp;new&nbsp; and very different&nbsp;context to the prompts on each play-through.&nbsp;It will include 4 very different scenarios:</p>
<ul><li>The Coma:&nbsp;You are in a coma and need to reawaken so you can warn a loved one that they are in mortal danger.</li><li>The Afterlife: You are haunting someone. Is it&nbsp;someone mourning you?, is it&nbsp;an old grudge?</li><li>The Stakeout: You are watching an unaware subject. Are you police staking out a suspect? Are you are a thief that has&nbsp;hacked the security cameras of your next target?</li><li>????: I want to leave the last scenario to the feedback of the ttrpg community. What theme would you like to see?</li></ul>
<p>This game is in development and&nbsp;being itchfunded. So far, the game includes 2 scenarios (The Coma and The Afterlife). Anytime the game reaches one the goals below, I‚Äôll&nbsp;write another scenario (up to 4), and then add $2 to the price. So buying early means you get it cheaper, with access to all future updates.</p><p>
</p><p><strong>Itchfunding Goals</strong></p>
<ul><li>Sell 5 copies of this game</li><li>Get 10 ratings on this game</li><li>Get comments from 5 people on this game</li><li>Get to 10 patrons on my Patreon: <a href="https://patreon.com/instadeath" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://patreon.com/instadeath</a></li><li>Get to 50 subscribers on my YouTube channel:&nbsp;<a href="https://youtube.com/channel/UCwTrrTuIv-EcWMhvuEJSPzQ" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://youtube.com/channel/UCwTrrTuIv-EcWMhvuEJSPzQ</a></li><li>Get to 100 followers on my Twitter:&nbsp;@instadeathpod</li><li>Get to 200 downloads per episode on my podcast <a href="https://anchor.fm/instadeath" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://anchor.fm/instadeath</a>&nbsp;</li></ul><p><strong>About the Game Files</strong></p><p><strong><em>Here &amp; Far (Omnibus) - v0.02.pdf</em></strong> includes all the content you need to play the game. Just bring a deck of cards, a block tower, and 20 tokens.</p><p><strong><em>Here &amp; Far (Core) - v0.02.pdf</em></strong> includes only the universal prompts that are used with every scenario. You will also need one of the following scenario books.&nbsp;Having this open lets you reduce the amount of flipping pages back and forth.</p><p><strong class=""><em>The Coma (Here &amp; Far v0.02).pdf</em><em>&nbsp;</em><em></em></strong>includes only the prompts for The Coma scenario. You will also need the&nbsp;<em>Here &amp;&nbsp;Far (Core)</em> book to play this scenario.<br></p><p><strong><em>The Afterlife (Here &amp; Far v0.02).pdf</em></strong> includes only the prompts for The Afterlife scenario. You will also need the <em>Here &amp; Far (Core) </em>book to play this scenario.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc4MTU0ODAucG5n/original/v80SCp.png]]






<p>A fortune-teller is in town, you note as you walk through the local festival. The smell of the aromatic incense draws you close as you feel the pull of a force greater than yourself drag you to the entrance to the fortune-teller's wagon.&nbsp;<em>Maybe they will have the answers I seek</em> you think to yourself as you push aside the lush violet curtains and step into the wagon.</p>
<p>Heroic Fates are a new mechanic that allows you, the player, and your GM to plot out a general progression path for your character narratively. Whether destined to do a great deed or suffering from a curse, Heroic Fates provide a new series of penalties and bonuses that develop into unique abilities as you overcome your fate.</p>
<p>Now coming as a complete set with Heroic Fates: Ascendancy and Heroic Fates: Spirits!</p>
<p>This is supplementary content for the fifth edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game, ready to be added to your campaigns.</p>
<p>Supplements produced by Monarch Arts range from classes, monsters, items, mechanics and everything in-between. Each supplement is individually priced so you can hand pick the content that suits your game and setting.</p>
<p>You can also check out the Monarch Arts&nbsp;Discord <a href="https://discord.gg/X44KGNY" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgzODY0NzYucG5n/original/2DRdeV.png]]






<p>High Magic Lowlives is a Post-Dungeon Fantasy&nbsp;Tabletop RPG about wizard school dropouts who get into trouble with the Immortal Aristocracy to make coin and build their #brand.</p>
<p>Like old school RPGs this is a game about a crew of weirdos finding subterranean vaults filled with treasure, kicking down doors, beating up guards, setting off traps, and taking home as much coin as you can carry.</p>
<p>Like new school RPGs the mechanics are simple, drive the story forward, and don't rely on a ton of preparation in advance.</p>
<p>Unlike any RPG you've ever played before you can get paid for livestreaming your fight against the jack-o-lantern queen of zabraxas. Your companions would probably prefer you help them survive the fight, but they'll forgive you when you capture their critical hit for all to see.</p>
<p>Clocking in at over 18,000 words, High Magic Lowlives includes:</p>
<ul><li>A unique system for making up monsters on the fly</li><li>A traditional six-attribute system to more easily use OSR adventures</li><li>A flexible setting with 22 unique backgrounds</li><li>A table named "d666 dating profiles"</li><li>Rules where getting a prosthetic doesn't make you worse at magic</li><li>Speaking of magic, domain-based spellcasting that rewards creativity without breaking the game</li><li>Character creation that helps you answer the question: why am I&nbsp;hanging out with these idiots anyhow?</li><li>An alignment system that defines the universe along the two most important philosophical axis of our time: Jock/Nerd and Prep/Goth</li><li>Guidance on how to run combat initiative-free!</li></ul>
<p>If you're interested in watching the game run live, you can see our Actual Play on the Happy Jacks One Shot Saturday&nbsp;here:</p>
<div class=""><iframe style="width: 500px; height: 281px" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n3BTmIvaVNI" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0"></iframe></div>
<p>If you're interested in knowing what High Magic Lowlives sounds like, consider the following mixtape we made just for you:</p>
<p class="text-center"><iframe src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/playlist/1YZenyjxBreauowJcWfQV1" width="250" height="330" frameborder="0"></iframe></p>
<p><strong>Praise for High Magic Lowlives</strong><br></p>
<p>"This game is based (in part) on World of Dungeons and Blades in the Dark, and I'm delighted to see the way they've been incorporated as well as the very clever tweaks and interpretations into something new. If you like WoDu or Blades, I recommend it."</p>
<p>- John Harper (<em></em><em>Blades in the Dark</em>, <em>World of Dungeons</em>, <em>Lady Blackbird</em>, etc!)</p>
<p>"Dan has created one of the most fun, brilliant, hilarious games&nbsp;I've ever had the chance to play. Not only does it have an incredible premise, it&nbsp;executes that premise <em>perfectly</em>. I haven't laughed this hard reading or playing a game in a long time."</p>
<p>-Spenser Starke (<em></em><em>Icarus</em>)<br></p>
<p>"The tone, the rules, the worldbuilding... everything. When I finally manage to wean my home campaign off 5E, [High Magic Lowlives]&nbsp;is what I want to lead them to. It's so much better at encouraging/allowing the kind of play that ACTUALLY occurs at my tables. A gem. A room of gems, even."<span></span><br></p>
<p>-Tyler Crumrine (<em>Beak, Feather &amp; Bone</em>)</p>
<p>"High Magic Lowlives? More like Yes Magic High-fives!"<br></p>
<p>-Viditya Voleti (<em>Space Goblins!</em>)</p>

<iframe width="720" height="450" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n3BTmIvaVNI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzIzMTA1NDcucG5n/original/J48%2FD1.png]]

!!![[Linux]]

!!![[macOS]]

!!![[HTML5]]

!!![[Filter by rating]]







<p></p>
<p>This game is set to work with the exact mass market TTRPG ruleset you think it is.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>It‚Äôs Candlenights, the most magical time of year in a world already full of magic!
