<p>This game was created using the <a href="https://sealedlibrary.itch.io/wretched-alone-srd" target="_blank">Wretched &amp; Alone SRD</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxOTMzMi84MjY1OTczLmpwZw==/original/0BKq3F.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxOTMzMi84MjY1OTc2LmpwZw==/original/IEpUrw.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTQxOTMzMi84MjY1OTgxLmpwZw==/original/GVlYxw.jpg]]






<p>Revilo is a land filled with new and exciting creatures for your adventurers to encounter. The days of players knowing how to thwart every enemy can now be in the past. Within these pages are over <strong>90 unique monsters</strong> with a wide variety of Challenge Ratings and Terrains. Also included are <strong>2 new playable species</strong>!</p>
<p>Use these in your homebrew setting, your favorite published world, or in the&nbsp;<a href="https://creaturecuration.itch.io/world-of-revilo-5e-campaign-setting">World of&nbsp;Revilo‚Ñ¢ Campaign Setting</a>. No matter where your campaign takes place, your players will be surprised by these new and unexpected monsters.
</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTEwMDgwNC82MzQ5MjA2LmpwZWc=/original/rAKvW8.jpeg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTEwMDgwNC82MzQ5MjE2LmpwZw==/original/wSbuzH.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTEwMDgwNC82MzQ5MjE4LmpwZw==/original/3ikydP.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTEwMDgwNC82MzQ5MjE5LmpwZw==/original/%2B7e31u.jpg]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTEwMDgwNC82MzQ5MjIzLmpwZw==/original/QEKbmZ.jpg]]






<h3>English</h3>
<p><em>Rewwixta </em>is a solo story generation TTRPG where you recount tales of revolt, rebellion, and uprising against colonial powers. It is based on brilli, a Maltese folk game. <br></p>
<p>While <em>Rewwixta </em>is inspired by various historical rebellions carried out by the Maltese population, the game is explicitly anti-canon, and we encourage you to tell your own stories of colonial revolt.</p>
<p>12 page document, with 1.5 pages of image and academic references<br></p>
<h3>Malti</h3>
<p><em>Rewwixta</em> hija lgƒßajba fejn jintqalu stejjer ta' assedji, ribelljonijiet, u rewwixti kontra setgƒßat kolonjali. M'hemmx b≈ºonn parteƒãipanti oƒßra biex tilgƒßab <em>Rewwixta</em>; tista' tintlagƒßab minn persuna waƒßda. Il-lgƒßajba hija bba≈ºata fuq il-logƒßba tal-<em>brilli</em>, logƒßba li hija parti mill-folklor Malti.</p>
<p>Gƒßalkemm <em>Rewwixta</em> hija ispirata minn bosta rewwixti li saru Malta, il-lgƒßajba hija espliƒãitament kontra l-idea li gƒßandek timxi mal-istess ideat. Anzi, nƒßeƒ°ƒ°uk tirrakkonta stejjer ta' rewwixta li verament jistgƒßu jissejƒßu tiegƒßek.</p>
<p>Dokument ta' 12-il paƒ°na, b'paƒ°na u nofs ta' referenzi akkademiƒãi u referenzi gƒßall-istampi li ntu≈ºaw<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzQwMzg2OTMuanBn/original/iZE%2FKN.jpg]]






<p><em>Monsters from the moon are wrecking havoc downtown. Your rival's face is on the billboards selling toys. You're running out of estrogen. Your parents think you should quit and inherit the store. Your friend wants you to do vandalism. You didn't even have breakfast yet and you have fifteen minutes till class.</em></p>
<p>Ribbons is a setting guide for Masks: A New Generation that imagines a whole new city that stars magical girls instead of super heroes: Serendipity. The city has a long history filled with both grim and hopeful times for magical girls. It has developed a culture around magical girls over the decades and now it has entire fandoms, marketing, and schools dedicated to them. Play as magical kids and explore the dangerous, crazy, and fun lives they lead.</p>
<p></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvOTc1NDc5LzU1NDQyNzkuanBn/original/D3A%2F2Y.jpg]]






<p><em>The Rise or Fall of [INSERT NAME HERE]</em> is a storygame for one player. It follows the story of a character ‚Äî a student at a new high school, a questing knight, a struggling artist, a young child who has found the door to a magic kingdom ‚Äî&nbsp;with shifting goals and priorities, charting their story towards an uncertain end.</p>
<p>A deck of cards is used to provide structure, choice, and chance. Each turn you will get a choice between two cards tied to the character's goals, with the rank of the card compared to the previous card deciding if it signals success or a setback.</p>
<p>The game has an optional journaling element.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzY3NTUzMDQuanBn/original/OF2oO6.jpg]]






<p>Rivals is a two-player competitive story telling game using the classic Rock Paper Scissors, to drive the narratives.</p>
<p>Players roleplay as two best friends from a small secluded village, both of whom are determined to become a local legend. They will go on quests, qualm local fears, and compete against each other in competitions, to prove to the locals that one of them is a true hero.</p>
<p>This game is about using your imagination, and humor, to create funny, and interesting stories together, as you compete, and sometimes interrupt, each other to become a legend.</p>
<p>Included in this purchase are 12 full color pages, and a sheet of tokens to be printed and cut out.</p>
<p>Join our discord and ask for help with any confusion, or questions!&nbsp;<a href="https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://discord.gg/5guPbwTX2A</a></p>
<p><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc1NTI2NDUucG5n/original/yo4uFm.png]]






<p><strong>It‚Äôs Monday TTRPG Night at Screen Time arcade!</strong></p>
<p>Everyone in the town of Fernweh knows and adores Sophia, the sweet co-owner of Screen Time arcade. Well, almost everyone. Sophia is tired of avoiding confrontation and keeping herself small. She wants to be a strong woman, but WHAT DOES THAT EVEN MEAN? 
</p>
<p><strong>You decide.</strong>
</p>
<p>Playtime: A "one-shot" length of&nbsp;60 minutes.
</p>
<figure><blockquote>‚ÄúNot only does Roll For Confidence thoughtfully portray a trans woman, it also takes a great look at TTRPGs ‚Äògoing wrong.‚Äô&nbsp;‚Äù&nbsp;&nbsp;‚Äî Beatrix Livesey-Stephens (Artificial Womb)</blockquote></figure>
<p><strong><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3NzU3OTkucG5n/original/8iW0eO.png" loading="lazy"><br></strong></p>
<p><strong>TTRPG and the Power of Games</strong><br>Many people have used video games and TTRPG characters to experiment with different aspects of their self-expression. Roll for Confidence highlights how useful of a tool games can be, especially for the trans community. Sophia rolls various different characters and chats with her friends about their characters and what it feels like to be a trans woman, as she tries to figure out what feels best for her IRL.  
</p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3NzU3OTgucG5n/original/Q%2F4%2BKD.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>
<p><strong>Cultural Awareness</strong><br>Roll for Confidence takes place in a fictional Northeast coastal town in the United States called Fernweh (pronounced Fern - Vee), with a strong LGBTQIA+ and diverse community. Toadhouse Games has reached out to the communities we aim to represent to ensure we do so in an accurate and respectful manner. We also hire cultural consultants and sensitivity readers.</p>
<p><em>CMC vignettes are unique snack sized games. They feature characters and locations from Call Me Cera.&nbsp;</em><em>A portion of all&nbsp;Toadhouse Games sales goes to charities that benefit the marginalized groups our characters represent.&nbsp;&nbsp;</em></p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3NzU3OTkucG5n/original/8iW0eO.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>Call Me Cera:&nbsp;A crunchy wholesome game about making friends as an adult.&nbsp;
<br></strong>Wishlist here:&nbsp;<a href="https://store.steampowered.com/app/1523870/Call_Me_Cera/" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">https://store.steampowered.com/app/1523870/Call_Me_Cera/</a>&nbsp;
</p>

</p>

<p><strong>Thirsty Sword Lesbians is a real game you can play!&nbsp;<br></strong>Find it&nbsp;here:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.evilhat.com/home/thirsty-sword-lesbians/" style="font-size: inherit" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"></a><a href="https://evilhat.itch.io/thirsty-sword-lesbians">https://evilhat.itch.io/thirsty-sword-lesbians</a>&nbsp;Toads Support Toads!&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzc3NzU4MDcucG5n/original/yshdgK.png" loading="lazy"><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC83Nzc2MTQzLnBuZw==/original/Y1tKkX.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC82NzcyODQyLnBuZw==/original/ac%2FFaF.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC83Nzc2MTQ0LnBuZw==/original/s8FvsW.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC83Nzc2MTQxLnBuZw==/original/dVnr3X.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC83Nzc2MTY3LnBuZw==/original/TerTZ6.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC82NzcyODE5LnBuZw==/original/79WlN3.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA1NjI3MC83Nzc2MTY5LnBuZw==/original/PQe64E.png]]






<p>I wrote this game to keep myself from dissociating at a roller rink! You can read the original game development thread on twitter <a href="https://twitter.com/adanarama/status/1141567502947799041" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>
<p>Play Roller Rink Redux if you'd like to try to return to a social space that scared you in middle school, and be kinder to yourself than you knew how to be then.</p>
<p><a href="https://twitter.com/adanarama/status/1141582242000465920" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin"><img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzIyMTc1NjAuanBn/original/R9MSKs.jpg" loading="lazy"></a><br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzIyMTc1NTAucG5n/original/StkrqU.png]]






<p>This is supplementary content for the fifth edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game, ready to be added to your campaigns.&nbsp;<br></p>
<p>Created with the wandering warrior fantasy in mind, the Ronin archetype allows you to follow a philosophical path of fighting, gaining powerful abilities tied to the path you choose.&nbsp;Will you choose the path of the wind, allowing you the power of movement and freedom? Will you choose the path of the night, allowing you access to shadow magic? Or will you choose the path of the tide, allowing you to follow the flow of combat?</p>
<p>Supplements produced by Monarch Arts range from classes, monsters, items, mechanics and everything in-between. Each supplement is individually priced so you can hand pick the content that suits your game and setting.</p>
<p>You can also check out the Monarch Arts Discord <a href="https://discord.gg/X44KGNY" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">here</a>.</p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzgzODU1MzQucG5n/original/prBEfi.png]]






<p><strong>Supplement to <a href="https://nerdypupgames.itch.io/rookwoodrpg" target="_blank">The Curse of the House of Rookwood</a>. Requires core rules to play!</strong></p>
<p><em>The Curse of the House of Rookwood&nbsp;</em>is set in a world of shadows and monsters, in which a family struggles with very real personal conflicts while facing supernatural horrors. The Rookwoods are presented as a privileged family, and privilege comes at a cost. We inherit the mistakes of our ancestors, and for good or ill they shape the world we live in. For the Rookwoods, the evils of the past manifest in the tangible form of Curses, which reveal themselves as family members partake in the privileges of their bloodline, their Gifts.
</p>
<p><strong>Check out the core rules <a href="https://nerdypupgames.itch.io/rookwoodrpg" target="_blank">here</a>!</strong></p>
<p><em>Rookwood Roots</em>&nbsp;is a collection of playable scenarios for The Curse of the House of Rookwood. Includes 16 scenarios, as well as new Skeletons and Curses you can use in any setting. Each scenario reimagines the Rookwood family in a new time, place, culture, or genre from a host of contributing writers. Explore new dimensions of cursed family drama in 1960s Hong Kong or turn of the century Bengal; create a family of cats or orphaned superheroes; form a found-family of night school misfits or kid detectives!</p>
<p>Scenarios include:
</p>
<ul><li>The Lodge on the Peak by <a href="https://bananachan.itch.io/">Banana Chan</a> (Jiangshi, Van Richten's Guide to Ravenloft)
</li><li>By The Serpent's Moon by <a href="https://thedovetailor.itch.io/">Pamela Punzalan</a> (#RPGSEA, Gun &amp; Slinger)
</li><li>The House in Hell's Canyon by Sen-Foong Lim (Jiangshi, Avatar Legends)
</li><li>Shisham Kandaan by Mariam Ahmad (Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse for Pathfinder 2E)
</li><li>Gold in the Shadow by&nbsp;<a href="https://gontijo.itch.io/">Guilherme Gontijo</a> (Into the Bronze, The City Where The Colors)
</li><li>Rookwood Collective by Eli Eaton (Behind the Masc, 200 Word RPG 2018 Omnibus)
</li><li>Blood &amp; Wisteria by Doug Levandowski (Kids On Bikes, Kids on Brooms)
</li><li>The Cat Castle by Stentor Danielson (Laser Kittens)
</li><li>Keeping Watch by Luke Muench (Kids on Brooms: Duel of Wands)
</li><li>Ashes of the Dead by Nicholas A. Malinowski (Kids on Bikes contributor)
</li><li>Bound by Blood by Sharang Biswas (Avatar Legends, Honey &amp; Hot Wax)
</li><li>Inherit the Wind by Wil Peregrine (writer, critic)
</li><li>Science Heroes by Michael Addison (The Curse of the House of Rookwood)
</li><li>Night School by <a href="https://brianbinh.itch.io/">Brian B√¨nh</a> (The Curse of the House of Rookwood, Three Bones)
</li><li>Junior Detectives by Jonathan Gilmour (Kids on Bikes)
</li><li>Children of the Vent by Whitney Delaglio (Prism)
</li></ul>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzMzc4MC83MTkzODEyLnBuZw==/original/aRPXOo.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzMzc4MC83MTkzODE3LnBuZw==/original/NOdKBB.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzMzc4MC83MTkzODEzLnBuZw==/original/cADoRX.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzMzc4MC83MTkzODE0LnBuZw==/original/vfufTn.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzMzc4MC83MTkzODE1LnBuZw==/original/lMeVQL.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTIzMzc4MC83MTkzODE2LnBuZw==/original/6BnjCn.png]]






<h1><mark style="background-color:#3f77a4; color:#e67985">Intro</mark></h1>
<p><em>A labor dispute at a valuable mine reveals the horrors that preceded it. The fossils of a little-understood ancient plant, glowing the color of a dragon's fruit, are crushed to a fine powder and diluted into a rare, luxurious, and intoxicating spice with unknown consequences. A monastery of a small but influential religious order harbors a dark secret. A hapless group of adventurers will face the potentially far-reaching implications of these intersecting arcs and decide what will remain hidden and the shape of the conflict to come.</em></p>
<p><mark style="background-color:#3f77a4; color:#e67985"><strong>ROSEATE GROWTH</strong></mark> is a fantasy roleplaying adventure for three-to-five lower-level players, written in a system-neutral style. It should last roughly two or three sessions with some ripple effects that could be tied into your broader campaign or ignored. It was made (very belatedly!) as part of&nbsp;<a href="https://yochaigal.itch.io/" target="_blank">Yochai Gal</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href="https://insearchofgames.itch.io/" target="_blank">Chris Mennell</a>'s&nbsp;<a href="https://itch.io/jam/dyson-logo-jam" target="_blank">Dyson Logos Jam</a>.</p>
<h1><mark style="background-color:#3f77a4; color:#e67985">Contents</mark></h1>
<p><strong><em>Content Warning: addictive drugs, an anti-labor massacre, mild body horror.</em></strong><br></p>
<p>The book is 35 pages long, and&nbsp;it contains:</p>
<ul><li>6 adventure hooks</li><li>30+ adventure repercussions</li><li>Dungeon map with 23 rooms</li><li>5 unique monsters</li><li>6+ unique items</li></ul>
<p>With purchase, you get the following fully bookmarked PDFs:
</p>
<ul><li>Single-page layout
</li><li>Facing-spread layout
</li><li>Printer-friendly, black-and-white, art-less version
</li><li>A separate file that reproduces the map</li></ul>
<p><em>Map adapted from three maps by <a href="https://dysonlogos.blog/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">Dyson Logos</a>.</em></p>
<h1><mark style="background-color:#3f77a4; color:#e67985">Community Copies</mark></h1>
<p>A limited number of free community copies are available below for those who are currently struggling.&nbsp;<strong>Every purchase of <em>Roseate Growth</em>&nbsp;will unlock one additional free community copy for another user.&nbsp;</strong>If you are feeling particularly generous, you can increase your purchase price, and for every $4.50 above the default price you pay, another free community copy will be unlocked!</p>
<h1><mark style="background-color:#3f77a4; color:#e67985">Other Supplements &amp; Games</mark></h1>
<p>If you are looking for darker, more focused and character-driven one-shot adventures, check out the ones I wrote for <em>Trophy Dark</em> below. All the rules you need to play are included!</p>
<p><iframe frameborder="0" src="https://itch.io/embed/990069?bg_color=000000&amp;fg_color=edc932&amp;link_color=8e79bb&amp;border_color=edc932" width="552" height="167"><a href="https://atypicalfaux.itch.io/the-pried-eye">The Pried Eye: A Trophy Dark Incursion by ATypicalFaux</a></iframe><br></p>
<p><iframe frameborder="0" src="https://itch.io/embed/1094174?bg_color=000000&amp;fg_color=5cceff&amp;link_color=fad285&amp;border_color=5cceff" width="552" height="167" style="color: inherit; font-size: inherit"><span class=""></span></iframe></p>
<p></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1Mjc5MC83NjgxNDA5LnBuZw==/original/gLF9Ax.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1Mjc5MC83NjgxMzk4LnBuZw==/original/iobXkD.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1Mjc5MC83NjgxMzk5LnBuZw==/original/KE%2FSYl.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1Mjc5MC83Njg5MzA0LnBuZw==/original/%2BG4iqk.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1Mjc5MC83NjgxNDAwLnBuZw==/original/IGlvXo.png]][img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTI1Mjc5MC83NjgxNDI4LnBuZw==/original/pvJqzk.png]]






<p>Have you ever wanted to hop on your horse, pull out your guns and go on a wild charge up a hill while cannons go off around you? Sure you have! And now you can, in Rough Riders!</p>
<p>Rough Riders! is a one page RPG about hard-fighting men and women who are driven equally by their lust for battle and their complete insanity. Will your team achieve your objective, or will the stress of combat compel you to do something sufficiently ridiculous?<br></p>

[img width=500 [https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzMzNDc4MjAuanBn/original/80NVQr.jpg]]






<p><em>In a long forgotten age, a raging war shattered and devastated the worlds of gods and men. Now green life blooms amidst the ruins of the lost worlds. Wondrous and terrible beings roam the Nine Realms. Civilisation stumbles forward, fresh and reaching.</em><br></p>
<p><em>Fate carves the skein anew but there are loose threads, lost long ago in the wars, with no place in the tapestry. These threads must seek the fire within and weave their own path.</em>
 </p>
<p><em>Strap on your bearded axe and linden wood shield, delve into the forsaken barrow and cleanse the draugr within. They will overhwhelm you at first so prepare to die. But when you wake up at the bonfire, you'll know what to expect for your next attempt. Parry their attacks, disarm them, and hack them to pieces. Defeat the mad jotunn within and claim the soul remnant they protect.</em>
 </p>
<p><em>Death is not the end.</em>
 </p>
<p><strong>Runecairn: Core Rules</strong> is a 44-page, black and white tabletop RPG zine, which includes a Norse fantasy setting, a full game system, and character creation rules for adventures set after Ragnarok destroyed most of the Nine Realms of Norse mythology. Runecairn is based on Cairn by Yochai Gal, with streamlined rules, fast character creation, and gameplay based on exploration and player choice.
 </p>
<h4>Core Rules Includes: </h4>
<ul> <li>Play designed for two players, one Warden and one Adventurer.
 </li><li>Full rules for play, based on the streamlined <em>Cairn</em> system and with mechanics inspired by the Dark Souls game series.
 </li><li>Death is not the end as Adventurers re-awaken at a bonfire when slain.
 </li><li>Four starting classes with unique weapon and item abilities: the hearty warrior with an axe and shield, the nimble scout with dual knives, the cunning seer with a staff and runestone magic, and the spirited skald whose voice channels the power of the gods.
 </li><li>Dynamic combat filled with devastating weapons, reactive magic, and reactive abilities.
 </li><li>30 forceful runestones spells for the cunning seer and 26 versatile sagas for the resolute skald.
 </li><li>15 unnerving and mysterious monsters drawn from tales of Norse mythology.
  </li></ul>
<p>&nbsp;
 </p>
<p>Illustrated throughout with evocative black and white line-art.</p>
<h3>What Others Have Said</h3>
<blockquote>Thank you for such an awesome game - I loved reading Runecairn and it‚Äôs on my list of 2022 games to get to the table. And the layout is lovely too.
 </blockquote>
<p>‚Äì Rich August (<a href="https://twitter.com/RpgAugust" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">@RpgAugust</a>), Steamforged Games
 </p>
<blockquote>If you're looking for a moderately crunchy duo TRPG, or if you're a fan of Souls games, or if you want to see a stellar adaptation of video game mechanics to tabletop, I would strongly recommend giving Beneath the Broken Sword (and Runecairn) a shot.
 </blockquote>
<p>‚Äì Richard Kelly (<a href="https://twitter.com/SprintingOwl" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">@SprintingOwl</a>), designer
 </p>
<blockquote>This is a quality game, adapting Cairn to an apocalyptic Norse setting with a greater emphasis on arms, armour and combat without losing the deadly and considered tone of the its forebear.
 </blockquote>
<p>‚Äì Sebrina Calkins (<a href="https://twitter.com/EntwifeXP" rel="nofollow noopener" referrerpolicy="origin">@EntwifeXP</a>), reviewer
</p>
